None of the people named seem to have ever worked at any GATE facility I'm aware of. Yet paperwork continues to appear. Who is P. Libwell? Their name comes up a lot on the paperwork.
DT_Emails.email_UnwearableHat_EmailSections_Index0:
Derek, I feel I must apologize for my outburst during the experiment with IS-0003 this morning. I really have no idea what came over me. I felt - though I hesitate to use the word - almost possessed.

You have no idea how unsettling it is to be overtaken like that. Frankly, it is a phenomena worth investigating, though I have no intention of being a test subject in future.
DT_Emails.email_RiggsSearch_EmailSections_Index0_E:
Derek, I hold little hope of this reaching you now, but if you receive this, wherever you are, let me know.

Tell me your location. I will extricate myself from Cascade, and try to join you.

Stay safe.
DT_Emails.email_NTA_EmailSections_Index0_EmailText: Derek, I need any information you have on an I.S. that looks like glowing, floating lights? A sort of will-o-the-wisp, I'm sure you know the one. It seems to react to glass or something.
DT_Emails.email_cahnmanse_EmailSections_Index0_Ema:
Derek, I wanted to chase up our chat about IS-0107. I just spoke to Dr. Stern, and he informs me that its rate of growth indicates it will be half the size of our galaxy in less than fifty thousand years. 

I believe we must act now to alleviate the risk here.
DT_Emails.email_bigfoot_EmailSections_Index0_Email:
Derek, I've been using some of my spare time to review samples of IS-0255's fur.

I know you requested I only update you with significant developments on this entity, but I have arrived at some very interesting conclusions, which I am CERTAIN will interest you.
DT_Emails.Email_Dam_Xray_EmailSections_Index0_Emai: Did you notice that 0023 hid at the far end of the Darkwater Cave when we were testing those new ultrawave systems?
DT_Emails.Email_Doom_EmailSections_Index0_EmailTex: Did you play that game I sent you?
DT_Emails.Email_Fermat_EmailSections_Index0_EmailT: Did you see Andrew finally proved Fermat's Last Theorem?
DT_Emails.Email_Alps_Bleak_EmailSections_Index1_Em: Didn't you say this place was 'breathtakingly beautiful' or something once we were assigned here?
DT_Emails.email_Onboarding_EmailSections_Index6_Em: Direct them to me. I'll take care of onboarding.
DT_Emails.email_Dams_Order_EmailSections_Index0_Em: Divinitor, I salute your planning with this fact: we have secured the facility's Reservoir and Power Plant. We await your assent to move on to the Reactor. How progresses our bretheren in Voussoir?
DT_Emails.email_ordermedic_EmailSections_Index0_Em:
Divinitor, Inquisitor Ganis informs me that he has been promoted to the ranks of the Purgati.

While this is surely a great honor, he wishes to submit a petitio excusationis, on the grounds that his existing research into the sangamor is of even greater importance to our brethren than service in that esteemed legion.
DT_Emails.email_OrderLodestone_01_EmailSections_In: Divinitor, the incidence of High Inquisitors seeking access to Anchorae has increased by a notable degree. Our reserves are diminishing. I do not wish to alarm you, merely to ensure that you are aware of this activity.
DT_Emails.email_OrderSalemOpen_EmailSections_Index:
Divinitor, tu bene.

We are aware of this sect. Their creed flows from the same font, but riven from all sense or proportion. Directionless, their patriarch is devout, all perceivable virtues of a humble saint, but his theodicy is indistinguishable from mania.

However, take comfort. GATE's discovery is perhaps to our advantage. We must also observe penitence: they located what we had lost.

Let them retrieve the Lodestone, then relieve them of that burden before they determine its provenance. Their investigations into such an object would be akin to flashing a beacon to the cosmos. We cannot allow them to examine it closely.

It cannot be permitted.
DT_Emails.Email_ShadowImmurement_EmailSections_Ind: Do you have any information about the entities currently immured at Intrados? I believe the Gatekeepers are containing something unprecedented there. If the being is what I believe it to be, they are in possession of an extraordinary lifeform - although this word is barely sufficient for such a creature. Hell, even 'creature' isn't the right word.
DT_Emails.email_Boston_EmailSections_Index3_EmailT: Don't get any wild ideas. I see what you're suggesting, and I'll mention it to Inderson, but people have got bigger problems right now.
DT_Emails.email_BehindtheShadow_EmailSections_Inde:
Don't read too much into an aside from one of those sage-burning soldiers of fortune.

We have IS-0117 under lock and key. If there is anything beyond it, I've heard nothing of it.
DT_Emails.Email_PowerCellLocationFlathill_EmailSec: Don't worry about it, they're high density sodium cells, good for at least a month but I'd wager longer. There's plenty of redundancy in the containment system, too. You'd have to pull out all three to reopen the Gateway. Access to the rooftops is restricted, and anyway no-one would be crazy - or stupid - enough to do that.
DT_Emails.Email_Doom_EmailSections_Index1_EmailTex: Doom? Yeah, and frankly, it was a little too close to reality. I feel like we're one misplaced portal away from a sequel down here.
DT_Emails.email_shard_EmailSections_Index1_EmailTe: Dr. Hammond took it to cold storage for some low-temp work. I said it was fine. We'll catch up on the paperwork, we're on a deadline. Box-ticking stuff like PSM can wait.
DT_Emails.Email_Labs_Tara_EmailSections_Index0_Ema: Dr. Laciter was asking about using the fluid from 121 as a power source for generating perforations. Honestly, Abeni, talking to him makes my head spin sometimes. But maybe it could work?
DT_Emails.email_Jordan_EmailSections_Index0_EmailT:
Durum est proelium.

It is a stygian wasteland, yet they defend it like demons.
DT_Emails.Email_Dam_Xray_EmailSections_Index1_Emai: Either it hates high-energy EM energy, or the sight of your mug spooked it.
DT_Emails.Email_Dams_DarkLens_EmailSections_Index0:
Elanor,
I've been reading through reports on your T3 experiments (I know you hate the phrase 'dark lens' but everyone else seems to call it that now). Firstly, I take my hat off to you. It is an incredible piece of work. You've managed to create a reliable targeting system for perforation portals. It's beyond anything we expected. But I'm also concerned. It seems to me that there are insufficient failsafes around it. I'm not even sure how you'd turn it off, frankly. Are we moving a bit too fast here?
DT_Emails.email_DLsuccess_EmailSections_Index0_Ema:
Elanor, my congratulations. The T3 test was a success.

I know I have expressed my doubts at times, but if I questioned you, it was, ultimately, in service of bringing us to this very point we now stand at.

I am honored to be your colleague, and cannot express my excitement at what lies ahead of us.
DT_Emails.email_perforation_EmailSections_Index1_E: Elanor, your theories are always welcome. Give me your thoughts.
DT_Emails.Email_Pope_EmailSections_Index1_EmailTex: Enderson nearly triggered a containment failure yesterday. How long do you think we'll need to wait for an apology?
DT_Emails.email_beliefvirus_EmailSections_Index2_E: Exactly, that's the point. It's impossible to even talk about it. The research is getting impossible.
DT_Emails.email_furniturestore_EmailSections_Index: Excellent, maybe we can catch the Celtics some weekend.
DT_Emails.email_tapewisp_EmailSections_Index3_Emai: Fascinating. Have you had any luck getting it to move?
DT_Emails.email_artefact_EmailSections_Index4_Emai: Fine, I'll recommend it for Ordo.... But I might ask D to keep it there for a little bit longer. It makes a nice centerpiece, don't you agree?
DT_Emails.email_Dam_Glowworms_EmailSections_Index3: Focus on 0142, Daria. They're just glow worms. Watch your head.
DT_Emails.Email_EnemyExor_EmailSections_Index2_Ema: Folks, it's Exor. I found them, I get to name them. Manse agrees that this is a fair rule.
DT_Emails.email_flamerat_EmailSections_Index0_Emai:
Following the audit of recent fatalities among your acolytes, it has come to my awareness that your latest cohort has produced, to date, only thirteen adprobatum Exsurgo from an intake in excess of triple that.

While your methods are your own, you must surely acknowledge the questions this raises.
DT_Emails.email_MF_Coworker_EmailSections_Index4_E:
For want of a better word, yes. A creature pretending to be a rocklark. We checked on the specimens this morning. One had vanished. In its place appeared to be a member of the Research Team. I swear Daria almost let it out. It talked to us, speaking in cliches, and seemed obsessed with food. It was downright freaky.

Eventually, it produced a stapler from somewhere. We still have no idea how it did that.
DT_Emails.email_Dam_NDMonitoring_EmailSections_Ind:
Frake has signed off the monitoring station, and it's live. It should give steady results from the Neutrino Detector to anyone who can be bothered to walk up to the Waterfall Apartments.

It can only update once an hour, so if you want realtime data, you'll still have to sail out to the tower.
DT_Emails.Email_MF_Synchroton_EmailSections_Index2: Frake isn't going to do anything. She makes up the rules as she goes along. This is a calamity waiting to happen (again!), and no-one seems to care.
DT_Emails.email_MF_silver_EmailSections_Index1_Ema: Fresh out. But here's the thing. There's an almost infinite amount of silver in IS-0138. That's where I've been getting it.
DT_Emails.email_OrderLodestone_02_EmailSections_In: Gaen, is it possible that GATE has possession of an Anchorae?
DT_Emails.Email_Spelling_EmailSections_Index0_Emai: Gaston, we need to be consistent here. Once and for all, are we using US or British spelling? We're dealing with superpowerful, other-worldly artifacts, and we can't even agree on a dictionary.
DT_Emails.Email_Sec_DataLeakage_EmailSections_Inde: Get her data immediately. Lock it down. Run GISP. Tell her if she talks about it with anyone else she's fired. I'll fill you in later.
DT_Emails.email_cahnmanse_EmailSections_Index1_Ema: God, I thought you were joking last night. What are our options?
DT_Emails.Email_Fermat_EmailSections_Index1_EmailT: God, that's just what we need - he'll be insufferable now.
DT_Emails.Email_Alps_Fur_EmailSections_Index2_Emai: Good news then. Its insulation value is off-the chart. You could make a jacket out of this stuff, and survive a bad night on Mt. Everest.
DT_Emails.Email_MF_SecurityLeakage_EmailSections_I:
Greetings Bridget,
I'm not sure if this is your department, but I ran a full-spectrum noise analysis on our Sector's communication network last week. I have strong evidence that there is leakage from our network, i.e. someone has gained external access. I'm happy to show you my data, or if not you, can you tell me who I should report this to?
DT_Emails.email_0083lockdown_EmailSections_Index0_:
Greyson, an urgent request: please install Level 5 security on the IS-0083 immurement site immediately. 

It has come to my attention that the entity is more fragile - and potentially prone to contamination - than we believed. Furthermore, it looks like staff have been interacting with 0083 on their personal time, which we can no longer permit due to the elevated risks. If Strauss or Enderson ask any questions, direct them to me.
DT_Emails.Demo_email_Background_02_EmailSections_I:
H, 
So we finally caught one of those dog things. KP called it a 'peccary' until she realized how large it was. I've noticed their behaviour is different here than in Anteverse 2. She has a theory that the lower entropy on this side makes their biochemistry more potent. They're stronger. It certainly seems more angry.
DT_Emails.email_SGscribblings_EmailSections_Index1: Hah. You know her favorite color? Careful, Casanova.
DT_Emails.email_Boston_EmailSections_Index0_EmailT: Hanok, what's going on? I ran into a TR team member this morning - here in Boston - but didn't recognize her. I didn't even realise they were still operating. She seemed quite disoriented, and asked about the state of things 'in this anteverse'. I told her, because her clearance checked out. Am I crazy?
DT_Emails.email_LawnmowerMan_EmailSections_Index3_: Have you been talking to Wakeman again?
DT_Emails.email_fragment_EmailSections_Index3_Emai: Have you had a chance to study 0052?
DT_Emails.email_Smeuse_EmailSections_Index1_EmailT: He's Scottish. They talk like that. And you've seen a smeuse, you just didn't know it.
DT_Emails.Email_Alps_Manse_EmailSections_Index1_Em: Hello Derek - we're processing your request. IS-0134 is a high-risk subject, so getting everything lined up may take a while. In the meantime, I'll send you Dr. Moreau's materials research. We hope you find them interesting.
DT_Emails.Email_NASA_probe_EmailSections_Index0_Em: Here are those images from Roamer probe - note these are classified Tier 3, and should be treated accordingly. They have no idea we have these.
DT_Emails.email_shard_EmailSections_Index0_EmailTe:
Hey Fyodor,
I was supposed to be running PSM tests on IS-0010, but ... it's not there. Did someone check the Shard out and forget to fill out the form!?
DT_Emails.Email_EnemyCarbuncle_EmailSections_Index:
Hey Isaiah, 
How did you manage it? I've been forced to work with dead specimens.

Incidentally, autopsies suggest they're the second stage in the lifecycle of a metamorphic creature, starting with 171. I'm beginning to wonder if it's possible that all the A2 specimens are connected?
DT_Emails.email_GKrecruitment_EmailSections_Index0: Hey Jan, do you remember asking me where I thought the GKs came from, where they found them?
DT_Emails.Email_TimeOff_EmailSections_Index0_Email: Hey Jane. Several of the Labs team missed their alloted leave last month (due to an influx of specimens from A2). They'll be getting extended leave this month. So just a heads up Labs Sector is gonna be a little shortstaffed for a few weeks.
DT_Emails.email_Murkweed_02_EmailSections_Index0_E: Hey Katherine, Idris - where did you say you collected that Murkweed?
DT_Emails.Email_Office_Gibbing_EmailSections_Index: Hey Kintaro, I'm looking for a gift for friend of mine who loves cooking. Any thoughts?
DT_Emails.Email_MF_MineTunnels_EmailSections_Index: Hey Sarah, I've got the map information you requested. I'll run you through them tomorrow, because there's areas you'll need to avoid. The TR team lost an IC in there a while back. It's been causing us trouble for months.
DT_Emails.email_Dam_Glowworms_EmailSections_Index0:
Hey Steven,

Quick question. I was in the Dam doing some work with 0142 this week, and I noticed something.

Have the glowworms been moving? I swear they've all moved since I was here last. Have you noticed anything?
DT_Emails.email_Onboarding_EmailSections_Index0_Em:
Hey guys, 

Who handles onboarding transfers from Springer?

We've got a few people coming in over the next couple of weeks and I need to know who to pass them onto after the safety briefing.
DT_Emails.email_Kylie02_EmailSections_Index0_Email: Hey, if I can ask a favor, I'm currently working the kinks out of the hardlight muxer. I'm running up against some serious signal bandwidth limitations. Can I run the issue past you?
DT_Emails.email_Voussoir_Signals_EmailSections_Ind:
Hey, it's me again.

This is getting a little weird... My friend from ASO just sent me this data on the down-low. You might recall they've got that VLA just over the range from Voussoir. 

They've picked up some pretty remarkable signals recently, and some uncomfortable ones at that. We both thought it was a planet, initially.

Please check over this data and see if I've missed anything. I'm hoping I'm just being a bit paranoid. These mountains will do that to you.
DT_Emails.Email_Tutorial_2_EmailSections_Index0_Em: Hey, you asked me to get in touch if we found any applications for new materials. You remember that fungus Lenora's team brought back? We did some tests. This stuff makes penicillin look like tapwater.
DT_Emails.Email_Sub_EmailSections_Index1_EmailText: Hi Archie - we're moving as fast as we can. We'll be starting to assemble the prototype in the bay this week. But please be aware, it's going to be several weeks of work and testing before it's waterworthy. Until then, it's just a fancy bathtoy.
DT_Emails.email_NightRealm_EmailSections_Index0_Em:
Hi Bridget

Sorry I don't have a lot to give you. Read the full report for yourself, but the key data is:

- We have not been able to open a stable perforation to Anteverse 39; we've had to rely on those 'created' by IS-0059.

- There were no reported manifestations of either IS-0059 or portals to A39 before our first onsite perforation experiments; Dr Shepherd's analysis indicates incidences are increasing.

- Following one such appearance, we dispatched a squad of Gatekeepers through a residual perforation under urgency. We have had no subsequent communications from that squad.

- In at least one instance, two staff exposed to the same A39 portal reported seeing entirely different details on the far side, suggesting perceptive subjectivity may be an element here.

- There are indications IS-0059 is susceptible to high energy x-rays; Dr. Tengku is investigating.
DT_Emails.Email_MF_MineTunnels_EmailSections_Index: Hi Dayton, I know this is an unusual request, but we need space to test the range of the perforation system. Have you got any maps of the old lithium tunnels east of here? We need somewhere out of the way, so it won't matter if the system does something unexpected.
DT_Emails.email_VoussoirSkeleton_EmailSections_Ind:
Hi Denis,

Have you been able to take any samples of IS-0202 yet?
DT_Emails.Email_PowerCellLocationFlathill_EmailSec: Hi Jim, what's the operating lifespan of the Flathill containment system? How long do the power cells last?
DT_Emails.email_labs_daybook_EmailSections_Index1_: Hi Kay. Just log in the daybook that you're its current target. That's all you need to do.
DT_Emails.email_Onboarding_EmailSections_Index1_Em: Hi Marjorie. Alesandra from HR here. Which departments are they heading to?
DT_Emails.email_Onboarding_EmailSections_Index4_Em: Hi Marjorie. For biosciences, it'll be Petra. Send her the details please, and make sure the transferees don't get lost! Otherwise, it should be fine.
DT_Emails.email_A2Cblackhole_EmailSections_Index0_:
Hi Mark,

I'll have the spectrum analysis you requested shortly.

It wasn't easy - Anteverse 2's entropy delta throws everything off - but it's absoutely fascinating. From this close, we're getting much more accurate readings on the black hole.

Judging by the preliminary spectra data, it's not - strictly speaking - a black hole at all, or at least, not any kind we know of. Again, everything works differently in A2 - it's a singularity, yes, but it seems to be emitting much more information than you'd expect.
DT_Emails.email_labs_daybook_EmailSections_Index0_: Hi Petra. We haven't met yet, but I'm new on the IS-0091 project and wanted to check something. I'm seeing 0091 right now, should I be reporting it?
DT_Emails.email_EndBioData_EmailSections_Index1_Em: Hi Sonia, happy to take a look. What are you working on, another confused albatross?
DT_Emails.email_Onboarding_EmailSections_Index9_Em:
Hi guys,

Probably a bit late on this, but I just noticed there's an email address in this thread that should be inactive.

Can whoever's using the acahn address get in touch with me please?
DT_Emails.email_700_EmailSections_Index0_EmailText: Hi, Stanley from janitorial. Something is very wrong with the supply closet under the Curie stairwell. I can't explain it. Can someone from CONT go check it out, please?
DT_Emails.Email_EnemyPeccary_EmailSections_Index0_: Hi, you need to take this one seriously. We retrieved IS-0178 from A2 and it nearly killed us. It needs FULL Crucis containment and anyone interacting with it will need GISP-rated impact shielding at the VERY LEAST.
DT_Emails.email_LeyakB_EmailSections_Index6_EmailT: Hilarious. Why on earth would I ever want to go to the Bahamas?
DT_Emails.email_lostdog_EmailSections_Index0_Email:
Hilda,
This report on 042 is gobbledygook. I only need to know one thing: was the Reubens exchange undetected? Can you confirm this?
DT_Emails.Email_SabotageDL_SubjectLineText: How do we turn it off?
DT_Emails.Email_Sub_EmailSections_Index0_EmailText: How soon until the sub is ready? We've reached the limits of research into IS-0142 using scuba equipment, but there's so much more we need to know. The reservoir is DEEP.
DT_Emails.email_LeyakB_02_EmailSections_Index1_Ema: I admit, it's hardly my choice of holiday destination. But is it really so different from our society, when you get down to it?
DT_Emails.Email_Labs_AnomalousProject_EmailSection: I am certain none of my team are working on this. I can't even find record of who filed it as IS-0060. I'm sure we'd both remember signing off on that designation. I suggest we don't tell anyone about this until we understand more. Bring it to the next Exec Committee meet.
DT_Emails.email_ContainmentFailure_EmailSections_I: I am not worried about the impossible. Everything is possible when enough things go wrong. We have more than a few holes in our swiss cheese. Do I need to come into your office and start quoting Reason and Wagenaar like some Shakespearian? You know I'll do it.
DT_Emails.email_labs_badtable_EmailSections_Index1: I apologize for the discomfort caused by the presence of IS-0513, but as GATE's Research Director, I remind you that we secure these things for the EXACT reason you're emailing me right now. We can't figure out what exact property is at play here, but you seem rather susceptible to its effects. In short: we all hate it, but we can't let that stop us doing our job.
DT_Emails.Email_KeypadHackerUnlockRecipe_EmailSect: I appreciate the concern for safety, Richard, but we're confident in our security procedures. Someone would have to get into the Facility to access the bots in the first place, and at the point? Bigger problems. - T
DT_Emails.email_BehindtheShadow_EmailSections_Inde: I believe I have noted previously that I require you to be more direct. What precisely is your concern?
DT_Emails.Email_MF_Nirvana_EmailSections_Index0_Em: I can hear your music from here. It's REALLY loud. What on earth is that?
DT_Emails.Email_MF_SecurityLeakage_EmailSections_I: I can't access my files now.
DT_Emails.email_MFMaggot_EmailSections_Index1_Emai:
I can't get close, but Varsha said there were perforation spikes before she had to leave. That's all we can report right now.

You do NOT want to go anywhere near Mines right now. 

There's things I've never seen, I don't know what, but the telemetry is displacing material at random. Sasha, this is terrifying.
DT_Emails.email_timebomb_EmailSections_Index2_Emai: I can't help but feel, Janet, that in the long term, there isn't anywhere sufficiently far away. This thing will, eventually, destroy our entire universe.
DT_Emails.Email_Dams_DarkLens_EmailSections_Index2: I did some rough calculations. It would take only minor perturbations to throw the system into disarray. We could end up with portals popping up... well, everywhere.
DT_Emails.email_timebomb_EmailSections_Index1_Emai: I did the math too, Abe, and it seems we have 50,000 years until it's larger than our galaxy. Which, given that it cannot be destroyed or dismantled, suggests to me that we need to move this thing as far away from us as possible, as fast as we can.
DT_Emails.Email_MF_CommsMonitoring_EmailSections_I: I didn't want to raise it on the call yesterday, but you saw the security data, didn't you? We're being monitored, that much is clear. It looks like someone's been tracking a LOT of our communications.
DT_Emails.email_ContainmentFailure_EmailSections_I: I didn't want to sound alarmist in the Executive Committee meeting, but in your judgement - and confidentially - what would happen if we suffered a complete containment failure?
DT_Emails.email_Onboarding_EmailSections_Index5_Em: I don't have anyone currently listed as a contact for Kinetics Division. Who used to handle orientation?
DT_Emails.Email_ArmoredExor_EmailSections_Index2_E: I don't know if there's a limit - everything we've been learning suggests they can evolve as needed.
DT_Emails.email_timebrake2_EmailSections_Index2_Em: I don't want to put this in an email. Come see me in C Block when you get a moment. You're going to love this.
DT_Emails.Email_EnemyExor_EmailSections_Index0_Ema: I doubt it's a surprise to anyone but these A2 entities are pretty dangerous. We analysed the specimen you brought back. They're smart, but we can't tell if they're actually intelligent yet. Kath's running MCC tests, though it's hard. Their bio-electrical systems are off the charts. They keep frying our equipment. Also, we need an actual name for them. X-ers?
DT_Emails.email_riftuse_EmailSections_Index1_Email:
I fathom your fears, Legate.

The Inquisitors must, by their very nature, pursue their tasks at the limit of acceptable investigation. But you are also trusted to determine where this line sits at any given time. They are precious resources, but not, in the final estimation, indispensible. If you must make an example, do so.
DT_Emails.Email_Hawking_EmailSections_Index0_Email: I finally got around to reading Stephen's book. It's not bad, as a general introduction but he TOTALLY misquotes my time travel theory.
DT_Emails.Email_EnemyExorLifecycle_EmailSections_I: I get that. But even so, doesn't it seem a little too perfect? I've been thinking about it. There's some really weird cellular architecture, like the favorable binucleation. Extremely hard to imagine how this would have occurred naturally in such a stable form.
DT_Emails.email_A2Cdatastream_EmailSections_Index3: I had a glance at the feed, and no, it's being routed through to someone at Keystone, so nothing needed at our end. But thanks for checking.
DT_Emails.email_CorruptBots_EmailSections_Index3_E: I have Ms. Muir's complete consent in all of this. You know that.
DT_Emails.Email_Rec_Bioweapon_EmailSections_Index2: I have a theory. A2 life was designed to be inserted into alien worlds, to reproduce, spread and overrun the territory.
DT_Emails.Email_ShadowImmurement_EmailSections_Ind:
I have no direct access to Intrados or its subjects. You are aware of this.

Derek, are you trying to be deliberately obscure?
DT_Emails.Email_SabotageDL_EmailSections_Index0_Em: I have no idea if you'll ever receive this, Elanor, and I hate to say I told you so, but it appears that someone has sabotaged the Lens. The system is relocating portals at random. If you DO read this - how do we turn it off??
DT_Emails.email_BehindtheShadow_EmailSections_Inde:
I have received concerning information from our friends at Intrados. 

When I enquired into improving the containment measures of IS-0117, they responded that there was 'no need', as they employed 'the same fetters as its creator'.
DT_Emails.Email_Reactors_Waterbot_EmailSections_In: I have some concerns about Dr. Wakeman's work on the waterbot AI.
DT_Emails.email_A2Cdatastream_EmailSections_Index1: I haven't heard anything, Moira, why do you ask?
DT_Emails.email_labs_creepingcrystal_EmailSections: I hear you. I'll put Dayton on it. He had some ideas for improving the failsafes.
DT_Emails.email_artefact_EmailSections_Index2_Emai: I just can't believe what I'm seeing here. I've doubled checked the testing apparatus, but they're working fine. The results must be accurate. This thing looks like a piece of bad sculpture. But it's 1.2 million years old! It's made from a ceramic-metal alloy, but we only invented those in the 1940s! Who MADE this?
DT_Emails.Email_Pope_EmailSections_Index0_EmailTex: I just heard the Pope finally apologized to Galileo. 'Sorry for not believing you.' Only took 600 years. But I guess that's progress.
DT_Emails.email_A2Cdatastream_EmailSections_Index2: I just noticed the monitoring station outside the village was still active. There's a steady data stream coming through from the black hole, and I wondered whether I was supposed to be looking at it?
DT_Emails.email_CorruptBots_EmailSections_Index0_E:
I know it's not going to change anything, but I'm tired of our sector being used as a holding pen for whatever Gatekeepers dragged from God-knows-where. As if keeping it down here makes it 'safe'?

And now these bots! What happened to them? You let Gatekeepers take those units on a few missions, and they come back looking like they've been reprogrammed by gremlins!
DT_Emails.email_labs_mysteries_EmailSections_Index: I know, I know, but just occasionally - sometimes - it can feel like we know nothing, at all, about any of this stuff around us. Then I start questioning everything. I probably just need more sleep.
DT_Emails.email_timebrake_EmailSections_Index2_Ema: I know, but Dr. Verenkov touched it and was practically stuck to it for the next 20 minutes. Now Dina Khattar's team want to assess the effects on him, which is fair enough, but we're still no closer to discovering where on earth this came from or who made it.
DT_Emails.Email_Labs_AnomalousProject_EmailSection: I looked into it, and honestly, I'm baffled. It's impossible to know what is being talked about in the paperwork. Who wrote this? I wouldn't be surprised to discover this is something to do with Shadowgate. Gatekeeper accountability is a joke.
DT_Emails.email_weaponrequest_EmailSections_Index3:
I must decline, Legate. This is the same request by a different name.

The Interfectors are a last resort, and we do not stand at that precipice. Their sisterhood would raze this facility to the earth with us inside as punishment for our failings. The mere mention indicates to me you are slipping in the execution of your duties.

I trust this is not the case.
DT_Emails.Email_Dams_Tier5Hacker_EmailSections_Ind: I need three photon receptors for testing, and they're telling me I don't have clearance! How can we be expected to do our jobs if you lock up basic equipment?
DT_Emails.Email_Alps_Fur_EmailSections_Index0_Emai: I ran a series of stress tests on the fur samples from IS-0134. Do you want the good news first or the bad?
DT_Emails.email_LeyakB_02_EmailSections_Index0_Ema: I read Rigg's latest report from A33. It's hard to believe the place is real. It sounds horrific, and the inhabitants are even worse. It's like the universe's worst pyramid scheme.
DT_Emails.Email_Reactors_Waterbot_EmailSections_In: I read his proposal twelve months ago, and he's strayed a long way from its original parameters - he's integrated elements of IS-0142 with almost no documentation or precautions. It's extraordinary work, but needs oversight.
DT_Emails.email_OrderLodestone_02_EmailSections_In: I recant. You make a sound argument, Artem. There is nothing I would not put past those mountebanks.
DT_Emails.email_OrderLostInquisitor_EmailSections_:
I regret to report that Inquisitor Sydyk has failed to return from his foray through the Rift to the suspected Lodestone XVII site.

We believe he has joined the perierunt. Nos recordabor.
DT_Emails.Email_Tutorial_2_EmailSections_Index1_Em: I reviewed the report. You're cleared for Phase 2.
DT_Emails.email_fragment_EmailSections_Index0_Emai: I reviewed the results for 0169, and I think they're correct, but I just don't see how it's possible.
DT_Emails.email_CorruptBots_EmailSections_Index2_E:
I should have guess you were involved, Stewart. I know you'll say it's 'all science', but you're exposing these robots to operative forces we don't fully grasp - hell, you don't even KNOW what the hell happened.

And don't even get me started on you-know-who. I still don't know what to think about those upgrade designs for her that you showed me in your Residence quarters last week.
DT_Emails.email_amnesiathreshold_EmailSections_Ind: I spoke to Yung about it, and she said something interesting. It makes people forget, right? She suggested it could be imprinted with something, a force we're not detecting, but embedded by an event so traumatic that it became part of the wood.
DT_Emails.email_NightRealm_EmailSections_Index2_Em:
I strongly contest Dr. Hammond's thesis and methods. He is unrigorous and I only included a summary of his notes out of respect for his work on IS-0010, etc. Drawing conclusions based on little more than mythology is unreliable in the extreme.

I would further emphasize that calling A39 a 'purgatory' or the 'latest instance of a recurrent yet chimeric underworld' is entirely without concrete evidence.

As to A39 being a 'psycho-nest' built by IS-0059 using living material 'harvested' from external regions, the man is letting his imagination run away with him.
DT_Emails.Email_February_EmailSections_Index3_Emai: I suppose that makes TWO creepy monsters lurking in our midst...
DT_Emails.Email_Antethermite_02_EmailSections_Inde: I think Hutton's getting sick of me going over his head to Manse, but if he can't see the problem, then he IS the problem. Leave it to me.
DT_Emails.email_timebrake_EmailSections_Index3_Ema: I think we can be fairly sure it wasn't Turkmen nomads, so that's a start.
DT_Emails.Email_WWW_EmailSections_Index3_EmailText:
I thought about it:

No.

Tim wants us to test software designed to share information with the entire WORLD, ALL THE TIME. He's literally calling it the World Web or something. This is a secret facility, Abe!
DT_Emails.Email_Labs_AnomalousProject_EmailSection: I thought about that, but it doesn't add up. Gatekeeper reports don't sound like this. And those aren't any GK staff we have on record. Are you SURE none of your staff are working on this?
DT_Emails.email_LawnmowerMan_EmailSections_Index5_: I told you Abe, this is a secret facility. The last thing we want is some ghost in the machine trapped in our network.
DT_Emails.email_Voussoir_Signals_EmailSections_Ind: I tried... Haven't heard back for a couple weeks, but I don't want to just sit on this kind of data. It feels irresponsible to keep it to myself at this point. I'll let you know if I hear anything else.
DT_Emails.email_labs_badtable_EmailSections_Index2: I understand what you're saying Derek, but there's something very wrong with that thing. You can feel it. Frankly, I can STILL feel it.
DT_Emails.Email_Dams_DarkLens_EmailSections_Index3: I understand, but if we didn't think the system was secure, we wouldn't be using it.
DT_Emails.email_labs_Ichor_EmailSections_Index2_Em: I understand. Lord, I'd hate to see their lice!
DT_Emails.Email_MF_Synchroton_EmailSections_Index0: I was coming back from the Foundry yesterday and passed an eye over the collider. They were working with the synchrotron at nearly 95% load. They're not supposed to go over 90. Don't they remember what happened in '85? The Manufacturing team seems to take no heed of safety protocols whatsoever.
DT_Emails.email_Smeuse_EmailSections_Index0_EmailT: I was talking to Dr. Stewart the other day, and I swear, sometimes I have no idea what he's saying. I mean, who uses the word 'smeuse'?
DT_Emails.Email_EnemyPest_EmailSections_Index1_Ema: I was talking to Dr. Tengku. She suggested the low entropy of A2 could, theoretically, encourage metamorphic lifecycles. They're more energy efficient.
DT_Emails.Email_Shadowgate_EmailSections_Index1_Em: I will enquire directly with Intrados administration, Dr. Manse, and confer with Ms. Garrick when she returns from her own research trip. You are not the first to express difficulties. Expect to hear from me shortly, but don't expect a welcome mat.
DT_Emails.Email_MF_MineTunnels_EmailSections_Index: I wouldn't use the word monster. We thought we brought back three, but there might have been four. It's a long story and it's not the easiest entity to track. We sent out a security bulletin with more information - check your inbox.
DT_Emails.email_Murkweed_EmailSections_Index2_Emai: I'd say it's more 'dim', so Dimweed. And testing suggests it's actually edible.
DT_Emails.email_Onboarding_EmailSections_Index3_Em: I'll add a couple of people into this conversation who should know.
DT_Emails.Email_MF_Train_EmailSections_Index1_Emai:
I'll deliver a full report tomorrow, but to answer your question, no, we don't know where the train actually 'is'. The star positions are the same as ours, for the location, but it's non-Newtownian. Dr. Stern believes there are two superimposed states at work, which the train's motion maintains somehow. That's a lot of suppressed energy. 

In short, if it stops, we're going to end up with a crater the size of the moon. We think, anyway.
DT_Emails.Email_February_EmailSections_Index2_Emai: I'll get Frake and her people to review the system immediately. We may need to install another tier of failsafes. Apologies for the late check-in on this, I was held up by a Keystone visitor.
DT_Emails.Email_MF_Entertainment_EmailSections_Ind: I'll pass your complaint on, but don't hold your breath. If it's any consolation, I hear the TV's worse the further down you go. In Reactors, it's all Home Improvement
DT_Emails.email_EndReport_EmailSections_Index3_Ema: I'll pass. If I never have to deal with anything like the Flathill Event again, it'll be too soon.
DT_Emails.email_cahnmanse_EmailSections_Index5_Ema: I'll talk to Carl about transport. He's still got friends at JPL.
DT_Emails.Email_Labs_Tara_EmailSections_Index2_Ema: I'll tell him to be cautious, and use one of the smaller portal generators for his experiments. Shouldn't be a problem. He already treats the one at the top of the lift chamber like it's his own personal workshop.
DT_Emails.Email_Tier4KeypadHacker_Security_EmailSe: I'm aware of the situation, Richard, and will do my best to get it sorted shortly, but we've got a lot of staff on leave after the 59 recovery, which was your suggestion, if I recall. You'll have to excuse me if it hasn't been 'high priority'.
DT_Emails.Email_MF_BedsRecipe_EmailSections_Index0: I'm concerned some of your people have been working extra hours, and not returning to the Residence Sector each evening. I've been hearing some of them have built BEDS down there.
DT_Emails.email_artefact_EmailSections_Index0_Emai: I'm looking at the results of the radiocarbon tests and I just had to ask - is there any chance 172 was contaminated during its recovery?
DT_Emails.email_Kylie02_EmailSections_Index4_Email: I'm more than aware, Alice. Thank you for your enthusiasm. I knew you would see the potential, above all else.
DT_Emails.email_beliefvirus_EmailSections_Index0_E: I'm not sure how to handle this. I wanted to send a note to all staff working with IS-0093, but ... well ... you know the problem.
DT_Emails.email_LeyakB_EmailSections_Index4_EmailT: I'm reading them, I'm just sure someone has made a mistake.
DT_Emails.Email_Dams_Tier5Hacker_EmailSections_Ind:
I'm sorry Isaiah, but all the receptors I had available are being used.

We had a few lying around but someone up the chain has decided they're a security risk. Something about their optics being a threat to our high-tier security systems - beats me.

I'll try and get you some, if I can, but between Rutger and Dr. Mayfield it's like talking to paranoid androids.
DT_Emails.email_BotRunes_EmailSections_Index2_Emai: I'm sorry, who asked you to? Was it Altar again? I thought he sorted out his "issues with rank" awhile ago.
DT_Emails.email_EndReport_EmailSections_Index0_Ema:
I've attached the report on findings from Synaptic's new co-polarimetric GPR.

David, it's incredible. We've pushed deeper than anyone expected, and the data's clear - the EM layers converge about a kilometer down, forming a toroidal 'power band'. Check the results yourself, but you'll see what I mean, it's like a double-ended funnel, drawing the currents in from both ends.

It's like Flathill on steroids.
DT_Emails.Demo_email_Background_01_EmailSections_I: I've been analysing the fluctuations from the last perforation with Suan. It's like there's energy entering the system from somewhere else.
DT_Emails.Email_Dust_EmailSections_Index0_EmailTex: I've been meaning to request a sample of the 'dust' from IS-0139, but I wasn't sure who to ask. Did you have some on hand or do I need to file an excursion request?
DT_Emails.email_yellowpaint_EmailSections_Index0_E: I've been putting this "yellow paint" investigation on the back burner for months now, but Manse asked about it, so I better do something. You did the preliminary assessment. Anything I should know?
DT_Emails.email_labs_Ichor_EmailSections_Index0_Em: I've been reviewing research on IS-023 and 121. We don't really know how big they're going to get. The Tarasque, as you called it, just seems to keep growing. I feel like we're really going to need to see some other specimens from A42 if we're going to make progress here.
DT_Emails.Email_BuildCraftingBench_EmailSections_I: I've been trying to put a personal project together, but I think I need some help.
DT_Emails.Email_EnemyExor_EmailSections_Index1_Ema: I've clarified this before: A2 is NOT "Planet X", it's not even JUST a planet. I don't know why this nickname is still sticking around.
DT_Emails.email_tapewisp_EmailSections_Index0_Emai: I've completed my analysis of the IS-0235. It appears to subsist on high contrast magnetic recordings. Copying the tape reproduces the entity, but any changes in the original are replicated in the copy. This leads me to believe they are essentially the same entity. In informational terms, they are identical.
DT_Emails.email_sundisk_EmailSections_Index0_Email: I've decided which one it is.
DT_Emails.Email_Labs_Lockdown_EmailSections_Index0: I've just seen the new security protocols. They make a lot of sense, but between you and me, are you concerned about the general staff reaction?
DT_Emails.Email_EnemySecurityBots_EmailSections_In: I've mentioned this before, but your "security" bots are a menace. They don't seem to distinguish employees AT ALL, and whose idea was it to get them to restock the soda machines?? I understand the goal, but there's a TON of valuable equipment in those things, which would have been a lot more useful elsewhere.
DT_Emails.email_700_EmailSections_Index3_EmailText: INBOX AUTO-RESPONDER: Mr. Rein is on medical leave until further notice. Please send all janitorial inquiries to Mr. Beckett.
DT_Emails.Email_February_EmailSections_Index0_Emai: Idris told me that IS-0091 escaped containment again this morning. I need to know exactly what happened.
DT_Emails.email_MF_Coworker_EmailSections_Index1_E: Idris, I'm not an expert. I wouldn't know if one was acting weirdly. They're fairly strange to begin with. What's the problem?
DT_Emails.email_MushroomCarbuncle_EmailSections_In: Idris, did you see the test results on those 'fungi' from IS-0171-B?
DT_Emails.email_DigitalOre_EmailSections_Index3_Em: If I said anything more right now, I'd just be speculating. I need another day, at least, but - between you and me - it's almost as though someone has distilled raw information into a material.
DT_Emails.email_Smeuse_EmailSections_Index4_EmailT: If I went creeping around in it, maybe.
DT_Emails.email_OrderReaper01_EmailSections_Index1:
If there is even the remotest possibility of the truth to your concerns, this is condemnable.

I will inform the Praetorium at once. Gather all the information you are able, Clericus. This directive supercedes any existing or subsequent directives from all superiors beneath Praetors. Confirm immediately.
DT_Emails.Email_Labs_Zomb_EmailSections_Index4_Ema: If you do that to me again in the restroom I swear I will shoot you with 099. This project is fraying my nerves enough as it is.
DT_Emails.Email_Alps_Bleak_EmailSections_Index3_Em: If you're feeling trapped in Voussoir, you'd hate Cascade - it's 200m underground.
DT_Emails.email_CorruptBots_EmailSections_Index1_E: If you're not interested, ignore them. They're proving highly useful to the Gatekeepers, and we're looking into the specifics of their adjustments as I type this.
DT_Emails.Email_TempleOfStone_EmailSections_Index2: Incredible. Did you take perforation readings?
DT_Emails.email_furniturestore_EmailSections_Index:
Indeed, the Furniture Store isn't located in our universe... or at least not our exact time period... I don't know.

We do know it's in Boston though!
DT_Emails.email_MushroomCarbuncle_EmailSections_In: Indeed. And they're probably delicious in a white wine sauce, too.
DT_Emails.email_cahnmanse_EmailSections_Index4_Ema: Indeed. I'll send you Dr. Stern's thoughts on the current weight measurements.
DT_Emails.email_Symph_EmailSections_Index2_EmailTe: Injured, intact. How can you tell with these things? But I know what I saw, and it wasn't 64. It looked like someone smashed a doll.
DT_Emails.email_Murkweed_EmailSections_Index1_Emai: Interesting. But it's called Murkweed, because the water's so murky.
DT_Emails.Demo_email_Background_02_EmailSections_I: Interesting. Certainly the energy differential is strongly in our favour. But I wouldn't jump to conclusions. We don't know enough.
DT_Emails.email_amnesiathreshold_EmailSections_Ind: Is there any evidence for this? Or is it another one of her 'feelings'?
DT_Emails.Email_Labs_Kizz_EmailSections_Index2_Ema: Is this kind of obsession one of the side-affects when drinking KIZZ?
DT_Emails.Email_Dams_History_EmailSections_Index0_:
Isaiah,
Thank you for the tour of sector improvements last week, but I'm left with serious concerns. The hydrodam was built 30 years ago to meet the needs of the original mining company. We're pushing the structure to its limits, but can't let the demands of the Research Team force us beyond what's safe for the system. You remember 1985.
DT_Emails.email_MF_silver_EmailSections_Index0_Ema: Isaiah, I'm looking at Elanor's specs for the T3. We need to extend the subwavelength limit of the lens, which takes a lot of silver for surfacing - have you still got a stockpile?
DT_Emails.email_EndReport_EmailSections_Index2_Ema: It barely is, I mean it would take nothing - comparatively speaking - to tip the balance. You can see the effect of the GPR on it. Imagine if we had something more powerful.
DT_Emails.email_AbeandJanetshow_EmailSections_Inde: It can feel like the Abe and Janet show over here sometimes, Joan. Be patient, your work is important, and they'll get to it. I'll mention it to Abe, too. Maybe that'll hurry things along.
DT_Emails.Email_TempleOfStone_EmailSections_Index1: It certainly seems so, Daniel. The site is somewhere in the eastern Aegean Sea, and although we can't confirm yet, we've found nothing to suggest a bifurcation. Celestial observations are identical with our own, if you adjust for roughly two-and-a-half thousand years.
DT_Emails.Email_WWW_EmailSections_Index4_EmailText: It could be a whole new way of communicating, Janet!
DT_Emails.Email_ArmoredExor_EmailSections_Index4_E: It fits the data, that's all I'm saying.
DT_Emails.email_Dam_Glowworms_EmailSections_Index2: It looks like they've bunched up. I'm almost sure of it. I wish I'd taken some pictures to compare.
DT_Emails.Email_MF_BedsRecipe_EmailSections_Index2: It needs to stop, Sarah. The security bots don't have an 'employee' setting.
DT_Emails.Email_MF_Nirvana_EmailSections_Index4_Em: It sounds like someone singing with a mouth full of ballbearings.
DT_Emails.Email_Dam_Xray_EmailSections_Index2_Emai: It was definitely the x-rays. Who could say no to this face?
DT_Emails.email_ContainmentFailure_EmailSections_I:
It would take an extraordinary conjunction of circumstances for that to occur, Derek. Our protocols are effective.

Simply because we deal with phenomena most people find inconceivable, it shouldn't lead us to fear the impossible.
DT_Emails.Email_EnemyComposer_EmailSections_Index3: It'll be in my report, but I'm afraid you're going to be disappointed. They're 'part' of the fog phenomena, but we lost any chance to explore their origins once we installed the containment system. They may actually generate the 'fog', but last time I suggested researching it, you said I was blowing smoke, remember?
DT_Emails.Email_Rec_Bioweapon_EmailSections_Index4: It's a hypothesis, but it fits the scenario completely. Ask yourself: Would we recognize a bioweapon if we saw one?
DT_Emails.Email_MF_Organization_EmailSections_Inde: It's a work in progress. Just try to just keep your tie from getting stuck in one of the machines, okay?
DT_Emails.Email_MF_ScienceWriting_EmailSections_In: It's a work in progress. Remember, sometimes the only difference between science and screwing around is writing it down.
DT_Emails.Email_EnemyExorLifecycle_EmailSections_I: It's complicated, but so are we. Their evolution must be selecting for a variable we haven't considered yet.
DT_Emails.email_Murkweed_02_EmailSections_Index3_E:
It's dimly lit. You can barely see it down there in the water.

It's dim. It's a weed.

Dimweed.
DT_Emails.Email_Enemy_EmailSections_Index1_EmailTe: It's going to be hard in the next few weeks, Derek. Give me an overview.
DT_Emails.email_LawnmowerMan_EmailSections_Index2_: It's incredible. They upload a human to a computer and it spreads across the entire world.
DT_Emails.Email_Alps_Fur_EmailSections_Index4_Emai: Its ignition point is far lower than cotton's and the flame spread on this thing's Class C.
DT_Emails.email_timebomb_EmailSections_Index0_Emai:
JANET,
I've got some interesting news about IS-0107. Well, perhaps that's not the right word. Maybe the phrase is "distantly terrifying." You see, Janet, it's growing. Not much, about 0.1% per year, but it's a geometric progression. I haven't done the exact mathematics yet, but in about 15,000 years it will be the size of the Earth, which could be inconvenient. Particularly given that it appears to be - conventionally - indestructible.
DT_Emails.email_dr_jaggers_funding_EmailSections_I: Jagger knows what he's doing, Michael, and he's extremely useful. That's all I can tell you right now, I'm afraid. But he's a nice guy.
DT_Emails.email_labs_creepingcrystal_EmailSections:
James,
It happened again. The intake got clogged on the 94 processor and it just stopped. I checked in the morning and the cell was knee-deep in crystals. We've GOT to make sure this doesn't happen.
DT_Emails.Email_Tutorial_1_EmailSections_Index0_Em: Jane, what's this I'm hearing about an investigation into our security? Has anyone spoken to you about it?
DT_Emails.email_LawnmowerMan_EmailSections_Index0_: Janet, have you seen the film Lawnmower Man?
DT_Emails.Email_ArmoredExor_EmailSections_Index1_E: Jesus, how many more of these things are there?
DT_Emails.Email_PowerCells_EmailSections_Index0_Em: Jim, I'm concerned we haven't field tested the power cells sufficiently. I told Enderson about them. He's worried we're 'relying on salt' to keep Flathill in check.
DT_Emails.email_DigitalOre_EmailSections_Index1_Em:
Just finished my first run on your 'Digital ore', Abe, but I scarcely know how to describe the results. It's, unquestionably, a kind of matter, but beyond that I'm struggling to classify it. 

The material seems to be fermionic, but also superpositional. So I'm deeply baffled. Suffice to say, I've never seen anything quite like it.
DT_Emails.Email_ThisDamnFacility_EmailSections_Ind: Just keep an eye on your wristwatch. Don't start a task you can't finish before the facility power goes out. Why the hell were you working at midnight anyway!? Get some rest, we can't afford to make mistakes. - T
DT_Emails.email_Murkweed_EmailSections_Index0_Emai:
Kath

I've been looking at this plant from the Reservoir, the Dimweed. The most remarkable thing about it is that it seems to grow at such low light levels, though I suppose we shouldn't discount the illumination from IS-0142.
DT_Emails.Email_EnemyCarbuncle_EmailSections_Index: Kathy, I'm glad to report we've finally made some progress with 173. The little bouncing fellow. We couldn't get near it at first. The thing wouldn't sit still, not to mention the spikes.
DT_Emails.Email_EnemyPest_EmailSections_Index0_Ema: Kathy, after studying IS-0173's internal structure, I'm coming round to your theory. It shows clear morphic continuity with IS-0171. I agree, we're looking at a more complicated lifecycle than we thought.
DT_Emails.email_Blackbag_EmailSections_Index0_Emai: Kevin. We are ready to commence the Flathill recovery. Please confirm the target's name and location, and that we have your authorization to proceed.
DT_Emails.Email_KH3_Pens_EmailSections_Index0_Emai:
Last Wednesday I needed to substitute an optical component so I 'borrowed' one of the AV gems they're studying in the Adjustment Wing. Someone who I won't name suggested I get liquid crystal from one of those broken CRT monitors they use in the Labs - and it worked!

... Until Moyer heard about it and got worked up. He said I was 'misusing company property' or some nonsense like that.
DT_Emails.email_OrderReaper01_EmailSections_Index0: Legate, I have reviewed the reports. The creature that stalks the halls of their grossly misnamed Security Sector, I believe, may be the enemy of old. It speaks akin to the cow worshippers, and behaves as the stories speak of the Somnivore.
DT_Emails.EMAIL_Order_Pens_EmailSections_Index0_Em: Legate, are your bretheren prepared? Our operative is in place and can remove the Dark Lens when ready. He awaits only the signal.
DT_Emails.Email_MF_Train_EmailSections_Index0_Emai:
Lenora,
I hear you're back. Very interested to hear your report on the Engine. Are we any closer to figuring out where it is?
DT_Emails.email_MF_Coworker_EmailSections_Index0_E:
Lenora,
We had some issues with the specimens you brought back from A24. Was there anything unusual about the rocklarks? Did you notice any strange behaviours?
DT_Emails.email_NTA_EmailSections_Index2_EmailText: Let me know if that changes, but don't mention this to anyone.
DT_Emails.Email_FH_Conspiracy_EmailSections_Index4: Limited. The resident is an outlier from the community, and regarded as something of a screwball. I believe we have scope.
DT_Emails.email_MFMaggot_EmailSections_Index0_Emai:
Lionel, if you get this, PLEASE send me any information you can.

Something extraordinary is happening, but I can't get to Manufacturing right now to investigate.

The Dark Lens is offline and the perforation system is going haywire, but the readings I'm getting from somewhere in the Mines are just - well, they're hard to believe. I've never seen anything of this magnitude.

What do you see down there?
DT_Emails.Email_MF_BedsRecipe_EmailSections_Index1: Look Richard, if they sometimes work a little extra, it's because they want to and a project needs it. A lot of this stuff, you can't just walk away at 6pm.
DT_Emails.Email_Tutorial_1_EmailSections_Index3_Em: Look, Manse is great at theorizing, but sometimes he lets his imagination run away with the facts. It's all speculation at this point, we haven't detected anything beyond a few probing actions. Our data is secure. Let them know it's under control - because it is.
DT_Emails.Email_Labs_Kizz_EmailSections_Index4_Ema: Look, Petra, I think we've been clear about this, or as clear as we can about Jura-level subjects. It has 'decided' it lives there. We destroyed an entire hallway, and it just moved to a new one. If we demolish every office-like hallway in Australia, it would probably just turn up in New Zealand! The safest course is to let it stay where it is, educate people on its effects, and discourage use.
DT_Emails.Email_Garrick_Intel_EmailSections_Index1: Look, this is her show. All of it. And we've all got questions. That's our job. But don't expect an answer to that one. No-one knows where she gets her deep end data. My guess? The Contractors.
DT_Emails.email_Blackbag_EmailSections_Index3_Emai: M? A useful idiot. We don't have any plans for him right now.
DT_Emails.Email_EmergencyProtocolsOffice_EmailSect: MESSAGE TO ALL STAFF: In the event of an emergency, proceed to the nearest SECURITY KIOSK immediately. Security staff will arrange for transport to Sector 4, where you will be able to exit the facility. The results of last week's emergency drills were dismal. Shut your station down and walk out. There are only three projects worth dying over, and most of us aren't working on those. If it had been a real crisis, I hate to think what would have happened.
DT_Emails.Email_Tutorial_1_EmailSections_Index2_Em: Manse suggested the Executive Committee thinks someone may be monitoring our data network. I thought that was impossible. The farm needs to know about this, we're the ones who work with the data day-in and day-out.
DT_Emails.email_NIghtEssence_EmailSections_Index0_:
Marta

We need this sample assessed URGENTLY. 

IS-0059 appeared while we were testing Varsha's x-ray system, and it accidentally strayed into the beam. It dropped this material I've sent to your lab.

It seems to be emitting blackbody radiation, but I need more data. Please be extremely careful.
DT_Emails.email_leyakessence_EmailSections_Index0_: Marta, I'm doing some work on high energy EM emitters for Frake, and need more of that material produced by 091. Do you have a supply?
DT_Emails.email_AbeandJanetshow_EmailSections_Inde: Marta, I've been trying to get someone in Kinetics Division to look at my IS-0078 findings for a week now. I think I've made a breakthough, but all I hear is Dr. Ross said this or Dr. Stern said that. I can't get a straight answer.
DT_Emails.email_DigitalOre_EmailSections_Index0_Em: Marta, have you run the analyses on those two samples from IS-0083?
DT_Emails.email_artefact_EmailSections_Index1_Emai: Marta, if there was, I would have told you. It would have been in my report. What's the issue here?
DT_Emails.Email_MF_Synchroton_EmailSections_Index3: Maybe it seems like that from the outside, but Frake knows what she's doing. There is oversight, it's just not YOUR style of oversight.
DT_Emails.Email_MF_Entertainment_EmailSections_Ind: Maybe it's a good thing I don't have clearance to open the gate to Reactors.
DT_Emails.Email_EnemySecurityBots_EmailSections_In: Moira, why are you telling me this? I am not in charge of security OR procurement. If you're serious, try Enderson. He O.K.'d the Wakeman project and I have never had any problems with the bots. I stay out of the halls when we shut down for the night - like you're supposed to. Let them do their job. We're making valuable strides here.
DT_Emails.email_OrdervsGKs_EmailSections_Index1_Em:
Need you ask, Legate? You understand the stakes, and the consequences if those theistic mercenaries escape with that device.

Our brethren are prepared. Drive them forward. The only cost too high is defeat. If I must invoke the Interfectors, I shall.
DT_Emails.email_UnwearableHat_EmailSections_Index1: No apology necessary. It was an exceedingly enlightening experiment, Petra, in more ways than one. In fact, Dr. Janek and I would like to buy you lunch to say thank you.
DT_Emails.email_LeyakB_EmailSections_Index5_EmailT:
No mistake. The TR teams have solid data. They’re still trying to track its movements, but the 0091 variants all display the same basic physiology and essential traits. There's some variation of course, but… at any rate, you're safe from C.

Just don't go to Leaf.
DT_Emails.Email_Dust_EmailSections_Index1_EmailTex: No need, I've got some. I'll have Tang send it over this afternoon.
DT_Emails.Email_ShadowImmurement_EmailSections_Ind:
No, apologies. I just have very little information. Getting data from that facility is like pulling teeth. However, I'm working on it.

In fact, if I have my way, I'll be visiting there shortly.
DT_Emails.Email_MF_Nirvana_EmailSections_Index3_Em: No, the album's called Nevermind. It's amazing.
DT_Emails.email_timebrake2_EmailSections_Index1_Em: No, what you need to tell me is that you've found a way to emulate it.
DT_Emails.Email_February_EmailSections_Index1_Emai: No-one knew it was missing for almost half an hour - the creature's invisible to most people. We chased it down with x-ray lamps, and it almost got Dr. Tang. Peters thinks the x-ray system had a brown out, but we're not sure. You're in charge of containment processes, you tell me.
DT_Emails.email_MF_inquisitor_EmailSections_Index1: Non, Legate. After Lazone, his technical order are sadly reduced. We must preserve their numbers, and trust we can reveal to him, with diligence, the virtue of our cause. He cannot, at any rate, escape without your help.
DT_Emails.Email_Rec_Bioweapon_EmailSections_Index5: Not if it was any good at its job.
DT_Emails.email_sundisk_EmailSections_Index12_Emai: Not in our lifetime it doesn't.
DT_Emails.email_tapewisp_EmailSections_Index4_Emai: Not so far. It's modes of movement remain uncertain. I've even tried shifting the show to black-and-white, but that just seemed to make it sick. I can't risk damaging such a unique entity.
DT_Emails.email_fragment_EmailSections_Index4_Emai: Not yet - but this is different. If you push it, it just moves until it hits something. Zero friction, zero inertia. It's a piece of something, I'm sure of it. Some kind of vehicle?
DT_Emails.email_ordermedic_EmailSections_Index1_Em:
Noted Legate, and denied.

A short term of service with the purgati is precisely what Inquisitor Ganis needs to galvanize him for further research into those parasites.
DT_Emails.Email_Shadow_EmailSections_Index2_EmailT: Nothing here is certain, Derek, and you have a long way to go to convince me of your 'thesis'.
DT_Emails.email_Kylie02_EmailSections_Index1_Email: Of course. And I have something to share with you, Alice. It could be useful to your current project, actually. Drop by this afternoon. But I would request you discuss what you see with no-one else, at this stage.
DT_Emails.Email_TempleOfStone_EmailSections_Index3: Of course. They were as you predicted. The place is a nexus. It gives Flathill a run for its money. The locals seem to be aware of it, too.
DT_Emails.email_labs_daybook_EmailSections_Index2_: Oh great, now I'm never gonna relax.
DT_Emails.email_SGPhotocopiers_EmailSections_Index: Oh. You mean the photocopiers. Those are for scanning documents and printing out schematics. You need to let Gomez use the photocopiers, Fane.
DT_Emails.Email_EnemyExorLifecycle_EmailSections_I: Okay, I'm certain: 184 is the final stage of the life cycle. It starts as 171, which metamorphizes into the little hoppers. That then gestates in those hyper-elastic pupal pods I showed you... Or sleeps in them? I don't know yet. Anyway, then it emerges as 178, then grows into the adult, for lack of a better word. It just happens a lot faster here than it does in A2, as we're seeing.
DT_Emails.email_timebomb_EmailSections_Index4_Emai: Okay, but in 50,000 years we get to do my plan -- Plan B.
DT_Emails.email_AbeandJanetshow_EmailSections_Inde: On second thought, I'll mention it to Abe instead. He keeps asking me to teach him to salsa, maybe I can work it into the conversation.
DT_Emails.email_OrderLodestone_02_EmailSections_In:
Our surveillance is imperfect and their own knowledge poorly indexed. I doubt even GATE is sure of the divide between their knowledge, their belief, and their suspicion.

Stand in another's place and allow your mind a new conclusion. The Anchoraes' masters would not have overlooked the Prometheans and their ambitions. It stands to reason, therefore, that they are guiding the fools towards their artefacts, does it not?
DT_Emails.email_Smeuse_EmailSections_Index3_EmailT: Our vent system is smeuse-esque - smuse-ish? smusey? - I guess.
DT_Emails.email_weaponrequest_EmailSections_Index2: Pareo. I personally request, then, that you dispatch a turma of Interfectors to assist us.
DT_Emails.email_Kylie01_EmailSections_Index3_Email:
Please, Annette, I am more aware than anyone of the implications. But this is much larger than one person.

The GADD is nearly ready. If I succeed, we'll have the platform you desired - a system that responds at digital speed with human flexibility.

I'll tell you when I have results. Soon.
DT_Emails.email_OrdervsGKs_EmailSections_Index0_Em:
Praetor, I bring ill news. The prometheans' pagan condottieri have apprehended the Dark Lens.

Our Inquisitors have intercepted communications that indicate this was Keystone's prime directive: the wretches were ordered to retreive the accursed device, then seal the facility and all that lies within. GATE intends to mask the affair, as one seals a crypt.

What are your orders?
DT_Emails.email_OrderReaper02_EmailSections_Index0:
Praetor, I come to you with confirmation of our concerns. It is certain now, the prometheans have unleashed the Somnivore.

They have long known of its realm. Now it roams their facility at will, transducting victims unopposed. We have lost several triarii already, requiem aeternam.
DT_Emails.email_riftuse_EmailSections_Index0_Email:
Praetor, I must report troubling activities among the Inquisitors.

It appears they are taking excessive liberties with the knowledge afforded them by their access to GATE's equipment. Quidem, I believe they possess a dangerous sympathy with the workings and dire purpose of this facility.

Only this morning, I discovered they have been utilizing the promethean's rift transport without authorization. They claim to be pursuing the maior finis of our order, but I have formidable doubts.
DT_Emails.email_Order142_EmailSections_Index0_Emai:
Praetor, a full report will be composed in due course, but our Inquisitors determined the following from their investigation of the entity that has colonized the sub-aquatic zone of the facility's Hydroplant Sector:

- It is mechanoid with biological characteristics.
- The precise purpose of its growth is unclear, but it appears to be sending tendrils into the strata beneath the cavern.
- There is nothing beneath the reservoir, although High Inq. Hasta Tria surmises they are reaching for the planetary core, or beyond it. He believes an investigation of the antipodal Atlantic is in order. This does not concern us at this time, I merely convey his prattles.
- Extrarius: Clericus Soter observes that A-3200 is likely to impact near this location in 2110. I was unable to press him further as he was obcido shortly thereafter, requiescatus.
DT_Emails.email_OrderSalemOpen_EmailSections_Index:
Praetor, it seems the prometheans have unwittingly revealed the location of a Lodestone. They established a Rift with no inkling of what they have unearthed.

The Rift is in their Particle Lab, near their bestiary, but we have not been able to reopen it. The adjoinment seems to require a biological activation. Inquisitors investigating suggest that GATE have harnessed growths from the dimension of sleep. The Reaper's excretions and coiled vines carry a worldbridge within them. We can utilize these to restore the rift.

Inquisitor Malanaki disinterred data indicating that GATE dispatched an expedition to the Lodestone's location. He interprets their psychobabble to imply they have encountered a sect of soi disant Bogomils, who worship the artefact.

If this is so, it is only be a matter of time until these meddlers discover the Lodestone, and thence its origin. I submit, this would be disastrous.

Please advise your desired course.
DT_Emails.email_weaponrequest_EmailSections_Index0:
Praetor, the Inquisitors have presented me with an urgent appeal.

They believe the Gatekeepers are too formidible a foe to address unaided. Our losses are high. They beseech the use of interdictum armis.

H.I. Hasta Tria specifically believes we have the tools within the Praetorium to turn the tide of battle, if only we are permitted to employ them.
DT_Emails.email_order_agent_EmailSections_Index0_E: Praetor, we have at last secured an excursor in their facility. They will abide as long as required, and act swiftly when directed. We await your instruction.
DT_Emails.email_MF_inquisitor_EmailSections_Index0: Praetor, we have lost one of our Inquisitors to doubt. Their fear of the facility's demons drove them to abandon their post. Shall we commence annulment?
DT_Emails.email_Blackbag_EmailSections_Index2_Emai:
Received.

What about the other target you mentioned? I believe you referred to him as the 'online sparring partner?'
DT_Emails.Email_Tutorial_1_EmailSections_Index1_Em: Relax, Richard. It doesn't concern anyone in your sector. It's the Labs team. You know how they are - always scared someone's leaking information.
DT_Emails.Email_Shadow_EmailSections_Index1_EmailT: Review the data and ask yourself: Is it possible there ISN'T an intelligence at work here? Logic and caution demand that we assume, behind all of this, there is an organizing force. Exactly what this is, and what it wants from us, we cannot yet know. But one thing is certain: We have its attention.
DT_Emails.Email_AnteverseExploration_EmailSections:
Right, I'm taking the tablets too. The suit keeps most of it off though. 

As for your gateway problem, tell Sergei. That's what he's there for. Please copy me on me any updates.
DT_Emails.email_SGscribblings_EmailSections_Index0:
Roger, I can't take it anymore.

GK Tajik keeps drawing "BLESSINGS OF YIG" on my workstation monitor with bright green chalk. Every time I clean it off, it's there again whenever she's back on site. And I know it's her, it's her favorite color. Why are they always drawing on everything with chalk!? 

And it's not just that. It's worse. 

Sometimes when I go to the toilet she is standing outside when I come out, asking me if I've got any of her field paperwork, and then she STANDS OVER ME while I scan it in. Last week while doing this she told me I "smelled like a scientist." And she keeps sitting across from me in the cafeteria. Not at my table, just the table in front of mine. It's CLEARLY intentional. I have to go talk to someone, this is harassment, right? I am starting to fear for my life.

- George
DT_Emails.email_labs_creepingcrystal_EmailSections: Roger. I'll check in with Wakeman, too. No idea what he's doing with the stuff, but I'll tell him to expect a plus-size load this afternoon. We'll beef up monitoring too.
DT_Emails.email_Labs_Greyeb_EmailSections_Index0_E:
Ru, I just got handed an R-3 for something called "Greyeb seeds". 

You know anything about this?
DT_Emails.email_lostdog_EmailSections_Index1_Email:
Rutger,
It's all in there if you look. We gained access to the MDP, replaced the item and removed the original. The security was laughable and certainly nothing Lenora couldn't handle. The work is in our possession, they're oblivious. Weird dog aside, it's actually a very impressive piece. You should drop by Containment and take a look sometime. I'd love to show it to you.
DT_Emails.Email_Sec_DataLeakage_EmailSections_Inde: Rutger, I got a report from one of the data analysts on Moyer's team. She claims she's detected some kind of 'leakage' in our data network. Could be worth looking into. I'm concerned someone may be trying to monitor our communications.
DT_Emails.email_Sec_Targets_EmailSections_Index0_E: Rutger, I was at the Security range on Tuesday, and I couldn't help noticing something that the targets on the gun range all have labcoats. Why is that, exactly?
DT_Emails.email_SecurityFailure_EmailSections_Inde: Rutger, you have failed. I trust your own extraction plans are better than your security measures. This notice hereby terminates your contract.
DT_Emails.Email_Splints_EmailSections_Index3_Email: Seeing a lot of e-mailing from a man behind on his quota.
DT_Emails.EMAIL_Order_Pens_EmailSections_Index1_Em: Sic Divinitor. But we must be aware, removing the device will destabilize the system. It is not without risk.
DT_Emails.email_OrderLodestone_01_EmailSections_In: Sic, Clericus. Praetor Gavras has determined the value of their research exceeds the risk. His judgement can be trusted. He assures me the flux is temporary, and all artefacts will be returned in due course.
DT_Emails.email_ContainmentUpgrades_EmailSections_:
Sir, I wanted to confirm that the Baird work schedule is complete. All containment units in that wing are now reinforced to GISP Grade 4 or higher. That includes impact shielding, blast dampening, electrical isolation and full spectrum security.

We've integrated biometric locks, temperature registers and movement sensors, as well as a double redundancy checks as a minimum.

In short, nothing in those units is getting out, unless you let it out - or deactivate the entire system, completely!
DT_Emails.email_timebrake_EmailSections_Index0_Ema: Sir, we've run into a serious issue with IS-0014. Its temporal distortion increases the closer we get, meaning that as soon as our instruments touch it, they stop working. There's no way to take a sample.
DT_Emails.Email_Random_IsWrestlingReal_EmailSectio: So do you think WWF wrestling is real? Or are they just acting? I don't get it. Why would everyone cheer if it was fake?
DT_Emails.email_amnesiathreshold_EmailSections_Ind: So it's from a ship? What else?
DT_Emails.Email_EnemyComposer_EmailSections_Index2: So we've got a new Mozart on our hands? I need more than that, Hilda. - T
DT_Emails.Email_Alps_Fur_EmailSections_Index5_Emai: So you could live through an ice age, so long as you stay away from naked flames? Fascinating.
DT_Emails.Email_Dust_EmailSections_Index3_EmailTex: So, did you get it under a microscope?
DT_Emails.Email_Tutorial_2_EmailSections_Index2_Em: Someone needs to go back in there. We need more samples.
DT_Emails.email_labs_mysteries_EmailSections_Index: Sometimes, I get tired of the mysteries, you know?
DT_Emails.email_EndBioData_EmailSections_Index3_Em:
Sonia, your EKG data baffled me, until Dr. Carson suggested running an acoustic trace.

I'm still struggling to understand it, there's a pattern to your heart's electrical activity right now. If you take the electrical signals and amplify them, you get a coherent signal.

It's bizarre, but I'd almost say - music.
DT_Emails.Email_AnteverseExploration_EmailSections:
Sorry Lenora, yes, we think the intensity of the radiation over there is due to high entropy levels. Energy just dissipates faster. We're giving everyone iodine tablets to counteract the radiation from expeditions.

But there's a problem I can't figure out. The numbers don't add up. Even with the higher entropic quotient, there's excess energy coming through the Gateways.
DT_Emails.email_gravitydampener_EmailSections_Inde:
Sorry, Fyodor, you asked for this abstract on 0052 a week ago, but getting 0107 out of here took every minute! Anyway, here's the data on the cube:

- Located: Anteverse 8, Feb 1989
- Classification: Relativistic device
- Effect: Reduces local gravitation
- Operation: (We're just guessing here) some kind of permeable graviton membrane.

We've done our best to look into this thing, but we just don't have the tools. No-one's sure what the 'right' tools are yet. Anteverse 8 is ... well ... you know it's like.
DT_Emails.email_LeyakB_EmailSections_Index0_EmailT: Sorry, did you say there's also a B? I thought we just had one of these.
DT_Emails.Email_RepairAnvils_EmailSections_Index1_: Sorry, that was us. Check the supply closet on Level 3 by the Silo. We were doing some heavy repairs up there, and needed solid working surfaces.
DT_Emails.email_700_EmailSections_Index2_EmailText: Stanley, when did this start? That was unbearable. Has anyone else noted this? Come see me immediately, I will need a full list of persons who have access to that room. This must be a side-affect from a nearby IS. This should have been reported sooner.
DT_Emails.email_LawnmowerMan_EmailSections_Index4_: Stewart refuses to discuss his research with me, Janet, you know that. But do you remember Tim BL's software? It would be perfect for this!
DT_Emails.email_Kylie02_EmailSections_Index3_Email: Stewart, I can't get your GADD project out of my head. Obviously I won't discuss it with anyone, but the implications are extraordinary! Even just for my hardlight work! A self-aware shield could modulate and focus its own fields. Imagine how effective it could be!
DT_Emails.email_Kylie01_EmailSections_Index0_Email: Stewart, I need an update on the HT project. You promised it would be on my desk a week ago. What's the delay?
DT_Emails.email_A2Cdatastream_EmailSections_Index0: Suan, I'm just catching up on a few jobs, and wanted to ask if there was anything else you wanted me to do with the Anteverse 2 data feed?
DT_Emails.email_furniturestore_EmailSections_Index: Sure, just watch out for the rabid fans.
DT_Emails.Email_Splints_EmailSections_Index2_Email: Sure, sure, just don't tell her I said anything. She's the last person round here I want to piss off. Next to you, that is.
DT_Emails.email_OrderLodestone_02_EmailSections_In: Sydyk has reported no such concern, and we have seen no indication of their awareness.

Sydyk is a wretch and a coward.

I am convinced that GATE possesses at least knowledge of the Anchorae, and possibly a specimen. I comprehend your doubt, but urge you to review the sources.
DT_Emails.Email_Labs_Taxonomy_EmailSections_Index0:
TO ALL CONTAINMENT STAFF

This is the third time this quarter I've found staff setting up containment incorrectly. I'm sure I don't have to emphasize how dangerous this is. Please make sure you are following the correct protocols for each and every subject - there is NO room for mistakes here. Ensure you are familiar with the procedure for the following tiers:

JURA: Unassessable

SOLUTUS: Uncontainable

THELA: Extreme Risk

CRUCIS: High risk

SANC: Known and controlled

ORDO: Benign

If you are so much as seeing these words on signs around you, you are in a place where knowing these by heart could potentially save your life, not to mention the lives of those around you. Our safety - perhaps even the safety of the world - depends on your basic understanding of this system. Let's get it right, people.

- T. Enderson
DT_Emails.email_Sec_VIPs_EmailSections_Index0_Emai:
TO: DEFENSE TEAM

Ensure LARGE SURFACE ELEVATOR is clear in advance of Executive Committee arrival tomorrow morning.

No Defense Team activity in the area between 11:00am-12:00pm.

All urgent transit between those times should take place via TR facilities.
DT_Emails.email_OrderSniper_EmailSections_Index0_E: Take a squad of your fratres and seek alta terra. Arrange yourselves for undique coverage, but we do not expect sustained threats from the water. You have full authority to free souls.
DT_Emails.email_Murkweed_02_EmailSections_Index2_E: Take it up with Katherine, she said she calls it Murkweed, and you know... she's our lead botanist, so...
DT_Emails.email_Labs_Greyeb_EmailSections_Index3_E: Tengku's got some new teleporter, beams samples direct from the Flesh Dimension.
DT_Emails.KeyPad_Hacker_2_EmailSections_Index0_Ema: Thank goodness someone improved door security in this sector. The Office's system is a joke.
DT_Emails.email_DLsuccess_EmailSections_Index1_Ema:
Thank you, Derek.

I must admit I am somewhat in shock. I was convinced the Lens would work, but there is a world of difference between belief and knowledge, in my opinion.

I've been working in Reactors for so long now, it's hard to imagine no longer needing it. I had similar feelings after Flathill, but this is certainly different.

The goal at CC was always to test the system and then bring it online at Cascade. Obviously the focus there shifted to A1, but today is different.

I'll miss Reactors, as strange as that sounds. One learns the quirks of equipment, its tones and noises - like a personality. I feel you'll know what I mean, that it's a bit like abandoning a friend!

But I'm letting the emotion of today carry me away.
