ItemTable_Pickups.pressuregauge_ItemDescription: A pressure gauge, used for crafting things of SCIENCE.
ItemTable_Pickups.brick_cpu_ItemDescription: A purpose-made CPU housing, used for crafting electronics that need a little brain inside them.
ItemTable_Pickups.brick_memory_ItemDescription: A purpose-made data housing, used for crafting electronics that require memory.
ItemTable_Pickups.brick_power_ItemDescription: A purpose-made power housing, used for crafting electronics that require power.
ItemTable_Pickups.pipe_hydro_ItemDescription: A reinforced pipe capable of withstanding massive pressure, useable in crafting.
ItemTable_Pickups.coal_ItemDescription: A sad lump of soot-covered coal.
ItemTable_Pickups.exorquill_ItemDescription: A sharp biological quill with strange properties. Might be a useful ingredient.
ItemTable_Pickups.transcendium_ItemDescription: A shimmering proto-crystalline ore with swirling patterns and geometric oddities.
ItemTable_Pickups.sugarcrystal_ItemDescription: A shiny gem composed of a sugar-like substance. Must be salvaged into a useable form.
ItemTable_Pickups.gloweye_ItemDescription: A single, still-glowing eye from a Darkwater denizen.
ItemTable_Pickups.eel_fat_ItemDescription: A slice of hearty, now-dormant fat from an electrically-inclined water creature.
ItemTable_Pickups.feces_skink_ItemDescription: A small bag of alien feces. Might make good fertilizer.
ItemTable_Pickups.feces_ItemDescription: A small bag of feces. Might make good fertilizer.
ItemTable_Pickups.motor_ItemDescription: A small electrical motor. Useable in crafting.
ItemTable_Pickups.controller_ItemDescription: A small electronic device for controlling electronics.
ItemTable_Pickups.book_journal_ItemDescription: A small field journal inscribed with a meticulous script.
ItemTable_Pickups.gunrepairkit_t1_ItemDescription: A small gun repair kit, capable of fixing light firearms.
ItemTable_Pickups.silverchain_ItemDescription: A small sterling chain in need of a good polishing.
ItemTable_Pickups.salem_book_01_ItemDescription: A small tome, perhaps part of a larger whole, and not great condition.
ItemTable_Pickups.censer_ItemFlavorText: A smell of unknown incense wafts gently from the vessel.
ItemTable_Pickups.lens_ItemDescription: A smooth glass lens, useable in crafting.
ItemTable_Pickups.steelcable_ItemDescription: A spool of a strong steel cable.
ItemTable_Pickups.aloe_ItemDescription: A sticky balm with some useful qualities.
ItemTable_Pickups.gem_ItemDescription: A strange gem from somewhere else.
ItemTable_Pickups.essence_reaper_ItemDescription: A strange orb from the evernight realm.
ItemTable_Pickups.alienwheat_ItemDescription: A strange wheat from another, even stranger place. Possible healing properties.
ItemTable_Pickups.acid_ItemDescription: A strong acidic chemical, used in crafting.
ItemTable_Pickups.enethiol_ItemDescription: A strong chemical, used in crafting.
ItemTable_Pickups.hose_reinforced_ItemDescription: A strong hose, sufficient to withstand large amounts of pressure.
ItemTable_Pickups.woodplank_reinforced_ItemDescription: A strong piece of wood, should be sufficient to create barricades and more.
ItemTable_Pickups.bucket_wooden_ItemDescription: A sturdy bucket made from aged wood.
ItemTable_Pickups.pipe_metal_ItemDescription: A sturdy metal pipe. Useable in crafting.
ItemTable_Pickups.seed_ropeplant_ItemDescription: A tenacious seed from a hanging plant with a traveling vine.
ItemTable_Pickups.carapace_plutonic_ItemDescription: A thick and sturdy hide, near impenetrable, punctuated by gooey globs: an alien growth of acidic pustules.
ItemTable_Pickups.ichor_ItemDescription: A thick blue liquid with transdimensional tendencies.
ItemTable_Pickups.scrap_composer_ItemDescription: A thick remnant of shell, with a resonance similar to heated clay.
ItemTable_Pickups.scrap_kevlar_ItemDescription: A tight stack of extremely strong, heat-resistant textiles.
ItemTable_Pickups.cog_ItemDescription: A toothed cog for engaging spinning objects. Useable in crafting.
ItemTable_Pickups.blood_plutonic_ItemDescription: A uniquely thick substance, possibly a type of blood, with strange chemical properties... And possibly usable as an accelerant in the right conditions.
ItemTable_Pickups.crackedlight_ItemDescription: A useful collection of components from a military-grade shoulder-lamp, but none of them intact.
ItemTable_Pickups.hose_ItemDescription: A very basic hose, useable in crafting.
ItemTable_Pickups.thermocell_ItemDescription: A very hot, very powerful power cell. Stings to hold, in a warm sort of way.
ItemTable_Pickups.liquidcrystal_ItemDescription: A vial containing some sort of liquid crystal.
ItemTable_Pickups.oil_fish_ItemDescription: A viscous oil derived from fish flesh.
ItemTable_Pickups.tablet_wax_02_ItemDescription: A wax tablet inscribed with roughly scratched notes.
ItemTable_Pickups.tablet_wax_03_ItemDescription: A wax tablet with a faint inscription.
ItemTable_Pickups.composer_tablet_ItemDescription: A worn ceramic-like artefact, engraved with what appears to be words and symbols.
ItemTable_Pickups.sg_book_02_ItemDescription: A worn notebook etched with a fine handscript.
ItemTable_Pickups.royal_coin_ItemFlavorText: Acquired from IS-0083, this coin comes with as many questions about its material makeup as there are around space penguins with an economy.
ItemTable_Pickups.book_journal_ItemFlavorText: Although not general orthodoxy, it is a foundational tenet of the Sagittarii code that they perform a divine act by releasing the spirit from the flesh.
ItemTable_Pickups.cpu_red_ItemDescription: An advanced CPU, corrupted by some kind of abyssal growth.
ItemTable_Pickups.bandage_t2_ItemDescription: An advanced bandage that will completely stop heavy bleeding.
ItemTable_Pickups.quantumglass_ItemDescription: An alien crystal refined into an extraordinary glass material.
ItemTable_Pickups.queenbee_ItemDescription: An almost-familiar insect, but far more dazzling. She's dormant, but could become active with the right housing.
ItemTable_Pickups.glowshard_ItemDescription: An anomalous glowing shard. Its surface seems to emit a white light with no discernible origin.
ItemTable_Pickups.crossbow_broken_ItemDescription: An archaic crossbow, sundered and broken, but perhaps not beyond repair.
ItemTable_Pickups.eel_organ_ItemDescription: An electrolyte-based organ, toxic no doubt, and still snapping angrily with electricity. Sourced from the eery waters of a distant village.
ItemTable_Pickups.key_ornate_ItemDescription: An elegant key, typically held by The Order's higher-ranked operatives.
ItemTable_Pickups.projectionmatrix_ItemDescription: An exceedingly powerful beam projector. Useable in crafting.
ItemTable_Pickups.carbonplating_ItemDescription: An extra-strong composite built from a mix of earthly and alien materials.
ItemTable_Pickups.storagechip_ItemDescription: An extremely dense storage device with a built-in neural bridge. Almost anything could fit inside here.
ItemTable_Pickups.mage_eye_ItemDescription: An eye that once belonged to a Gatekeeper Mystagogue -- or perhaps still does.
ItemTable_Pickups.slushie_ItemDescription: An ice cold beverage with a kick of flavor. May cause a slight chill.
ItemTable_Pickups.refinedcarbon_ItemDescription: An immaculate and peculiar carbon spheroid.
ItemTable_Pickups.motionmod_ItemDescription: An incredibly high-tech and possibly stolen technology that can provide exaggerated motion at almost zero cost.
ItemTable_Pickups.gunrepairkit_t2_ItemDescription: An intermediate gun repair kit, capable of fixing medium-sized firearms.
ItemTable_Pickups.oil_robot_ItemDescription: An oily extract from a robot, could be some kind of grease for the joints, could be something else.
ItemTable_Pickups.pocketwatch_ItemDescription: An old time-telling device, full of useful little components.
ItemTable_Pickups.lodestone_ItemDescription: An ornately wrought, innately alien cube composed of a porous but immensely strong material.
ItemTable_Pickups.lodestone_fragment_ItemDescription: An unsettling piece of an inexplicable object.
ItemTable_Pickups.FULLWATERPOT_ItemDescription: Any sort of pot of water, filled to the brim with clean water.
ItemTable_Pickups.scrap_glass_ItemDescription: Bits and pieces of collected glass.
ItemTable_Pickups.fishbones_ItemDescription: Bones from a fish of some kind.
ItemTable_Pickups.lodestone_fragment_ItemFlavorText: Broken open the interior of the Lodestone reveals itself to be a melding of a rigid, porous substance and what appears to be flesh, as though some part was alive. Whether it is injured or not is beyond your ability to assess at present.
ItemTable_Pickups.alienwheat_ItemFlavorText: Calling this a grain is stretching the definition.
ItemTable_Pickups.bucket_metal_ItemDescription: Can be filled with many types of liquids, including molten material.
ItemTable_Pickups.bucket_plastic_ItemDescription: Can be filled with many types of liquids.
ItemTable_Pickups.waterbottle_ItemDescription: Can be filled with water and used in crafting.
ItemTable_Pickups.seed_rice_ItemDescription: Can be planted in a Garden Plot to grow Xanterium Rice.
ItemTable_Pickups.seed_antelight_ItemDescription: Can be planted in a Garden Plot to grow a glowy Antelight.
ItemTable_Pickups.seed_antelight_RGB_ItemDescription: Can be planted in a Garden Plot to grow a glowy and color-changing Antelight.
ItemTable_Pickups.seed_antelight_space_ItemDescription: Can be planted in a Garden Plot to grow a glowy and mesmeric Antelight.
ItemTable_Pickups.seed_antelight_blue_ItemDescription: Can be planted in a Garden Plot to grow a glowy blue Antelight.
ItemTable_Pickups.seed_antelight_GRN_ItemDescription: Can be planted in a Garden Plot to grow a glowy green Antelight.
ItemTable_Pickups.seed_antelight_orange_ItemDescription: Can be planted in a Garden Plot to grow a glowy orange Antelight.
ItemTable_Pickups.seed_antelight_pink_ItemDescription: Can be planted in a Garden Plot to grow a glowy pink Antelight.
ItemTable_Pickups.seed_antelight_red_ItemDescription: Can be planted in a Garden Plot to grow a glowy red Antelight.
ItemTable_Pickups.seed_glowtulip_ItemDescription: Can be planted in a Garden Plot to grow a luminescent subterranean flower.
ItemTable_Pickups.seed_supertomato_ItemDescription: Can be planted in a Garden Plot to grow a plant with large, tomato-like fruit.
ItemTable_Pickups.seed_vine_ItemDescription: Can be planted in a Garden Plot to grow a protective Snag Vine plant.
ItemTable_Pickups.seed_greyeb_ItemDescription: Can be planted in a Garden Plot to grow an attractive Greyeb plant.
ItemTable_Pickups.seed_eggplant_ItemDescription: Can be planted in a Garden Plot to grow an interesting and edible "egg" plant.
ItemTable_Pickups.seed_pumpkin_ItemDescription: Can be planted in a Garden Plot to grow bountiful pumpkins.
ItemTable_Pickups.seed_tomato_ItemDescription: Can be planted in a Garden Plot to grow hearty tomatoes.
ItemTable_Pickups.seed_wheat_ItemDescription: Can be planted in a Garden Plot to grow rejuvenating Anteverse Wheat.
ItemTable_Pickups.seed_shadowberry_ItemDescription: Can be planted in a Garden Plot to grow succulent shadowberries.
ItemTable_Pickups.seed_corn_ItemDescription: Can be planted in a Garden Plot to grow tasty corn.
ItemTable_Pickups.seed_nyxshade_ItemDescription: Can be planted in a Garden Plot to grow the terrifying Nyxshade plant.
ItemTable_Pickups.transcendium_ItemFlavorText: Durable, dense, conductive... And perhaps something more?
ItemTable_Pickups.salem_book_02_ItemFlavorText: Faithday 41 - In pursuing our pious ends, some dalliance with the outer world is unavoidable. As such, I have authorized the exploitation of silver veins in the hills of the village. We must keep our encounters with Outsiders to an absolute minimum, but a small trade in that damnable coin is, I fear, the price of sustaining our pursuit of Paradise.
ItemTable_Pickups.composer_tablet_ItemFlavorText: Gazing at this tablet, you sense meanings embedded in the inscriptions on its surface, but cannot quite grasp them. Images of light and shadow flicker to mind, of bodies connected by immaterial threads, mist and distress, and behind or perhaps above it all, a sense of intention and desire, and of anger suppressed. For some reason, in spite of it all, two words materialize clearly in your mind: The Puppeteer.
ItemTable_Pickups.powercell_ItemDescription: High tech nonsense. Probably very useful.
ItemTable_Pickups.sydyk_book_02_ItemFlavorText: I acknowledge that my use of riftwork in pursuit of Lodestone XVII to this realm was unlicensed. The deceit torments me, yet I am close to locating the artifact. I feel almost that it calls me, that it wishes to be located and, if I pause, I will be pinned by imperatives I cannot resolve. As such, I continue in secrecy until this task is fulfilled, though my animus suffers. Yet I cannot let our Order's tenets interfere with their own purpose - the securement of our world.
ItemTable_Pickups.crackedlight_ItemFlavorText: If only you had new lenses...
ItemTable_Pickups.iodinetablets_ItemDescription: Iodine tablets that can reduce radiation someone receives, as well as reduce radiation they currently have.
ItemTable_Pickups.sydyk_book_01_ItemFlavorText: It being among my prime negotiae to assist the securement of Lodestones, I make these notes as record, and apologia: I have not made the existence of Lodestone XVII known to my Legate. Yet it is among the most powerful my brethren have discovered. Its retrieval is essential, and I act in accordance with this dictum, in summa commitment.
ItemTable_Pickups.eel_organ_ItemFlavorText: It tingles to the touch. Perhaps some energy is still stored within?
ItemTable_Pickups.mage_eye_ItemFlavorText: It's almost as if something is alive in there, but it's probably a mere projection.
ItemTable_Pickups.essence_reaper_ItemFlavorText: It's cold to the touch, like a stone left out in the autumn dark.
ItemTable_Pickups.feces_donotspawn_ItemDescription: It's pretty much what you think it is.
ItemTable_Pickups.refinedcarbon_ItemFlavorText: It's quite heavy for its size.
ItemTable_Pickups.bandage_ItemFlavorText: Just some rags, but it'll do.
ItemTable_Pickups.chains_ItemDescription: Links of metal. Useable in crafting.
ItemTable_Pickups.sydyk_book_02_ItemDescription: Little more than a scuffed bundle of papers.
ItemTable_Pickups.scrap_arcane_ItemFlavorText: Many of the items resemble symbolic defenses or rites, and some are even etched with runes and prayers. Their exact use - or efficacy - remains in question.
ItemTable_Pickups.yetifur_ItemDescription: Natural fibers with an exceedingly high insulation value.
ItemTable_Pickups.infrared_emitter_ItemFlavorText: Not just your average TV remote.
ItemTable_Pickups.receptor_ItemFlavorText: Not that different to the human eye, really.
ItemTable_Pickups.scrap_bio_ItemFlavorText: Not to be confused for actual food.
ItemTable_Pickups.coil_v2_ItemDescription: Often used for conducting high amounts of electricial energy, this coiled enamel wire greatly increases the output of electrical devices. Useable in crafting.
ItemTable_Pickups.petn_ItemDescription: Pentaerythritol tetranitrate, the basis for any effective military-grade explosive.
ItemTable_Pickups.sg_book_03_ItemFlavorText: Perhaps most critically, they also inherited several research staff, including Sukov, Verenkov and Janek, whose work in Flathill went some way to redeeming their earlier, failed foray into rift technology.
ItemTable_Pickups.sydyk_book_03_ItemFlavorText: Postremo, I have Lodestone XVII in my possession, but doubts churn, ceaseless, sleepless. I must return to the Praetorium, yet I have not yet divined the Lodestone's intentions here. I am negligent, but every moment I delay increases the likelihood of my annulment. If I am condemned, does not further study of the Flesh redeem my sacrifice? I know not how to serve my brethren.
ItemTable_Pickups.salem_book_03_ItemFlavorText: Prayerday 11 - Ye the truth was revealed in a tavern, and deceit fell like shales from my eyes as I heard the words of Petrae from the mouth of this drunken, self-pitying apostate. Snivelling like a rat, he told me of his Order's faith, which had proven too demanding for his spirit. He had been an Inquisitor, he said, and was now nothing. Yet just as he foreswore his fealty, I felt the truth of his Order's creed take root in my soul.
ItemTable_Pickups.canteen_ItemFlavorText: Sagittarii training has ancient roots, but their true founding traces to the aftermath of the Albigensian Crusade in the 13th Century.
ItemTable_Pickups.flashlight_basic_ItemDescription: Shed some light on the subject.
ItemTable_Pickups.grease_ItemDescription: Slippery grease for things that need to slip.
ItemTable_Pickups.tinygears_ItemDescription: Small gears for itsy bitsy machines.
ItemTable_Pickups.essence_leyak_ItemDescription: Some kind of discharge recovered from IS-0091 after it's exposed to high-intensity X-Rays.
ItemTable_Pickups.growth_ItemDescription: Some sort of nano-mechanical storage system.
ItemTable_Pickups.carapace_ItemDescription: Some tough insectoid shell from an insect in Anteverse II.
ItemTable_Pickups.core_fragment_ItemFlavorText: Something tells you that it yearns to be reunited with its parent.
ItemTable_Pickups.wax_ItemDescription: Something that could almost be called wax, from something that could almost be called a bee.
ItemTable_Pickups.salem_book_01_ItemFlavorText: Soulsday 30 - I have done everything within my power to protect us from the Enemy, establishing our brethren here in Canaan, far from His greatest temptations and taunts. It is a fine and fitting sanctuary to record the teachings of Petrae and share them with the faithful. But until we find a way to exeunt this plane, where every element and essence exudes His evil intention, we can never escape His influence entirely. Again, it all returns to the promise of the Lodestone. My faith in it as a gift from beyond wavers not.
ItemTable_Pickups.rebar_ItemDescription: Strong steel bars used in crafting and other things.
ItemTable_Pickups.anomaly_ItemFlavorText: Surely there's something in the GATE Compendium about this...
ItemTable_Pickups.tablet_wax_02_ItemFlavorText: The Corinthian's work is extraordinary, yet he is honest enough to admit his ignorance. The device he has crafted to harness Athena's gift is a masterwork. Whether it will satisfy the gods, that is another matter. If they suspect the slightest hubris, our work here will be for nothing.
ItemTable_Pickups.salem_book_05_ItemFlavorText: The Faithless Tetrad from lands of Kaskade. Chased two, hanged, cleansed. Two missing. The mark of which they are known is the arched path, or the eyeless tunnel. Several crates and curios stolen, made from strange irons.
ItemTable_Pickups.ichor_ItemFlavorText: The internal fluids of a titan.
ItemTable_Pickups.goo_exor_ItemDescription: The leaking residue of a biological monolith, stored in a small vessel of alien pottery.
ItemTable_Pickups.digital_ore_ItemDescription: The melted-down remnants of something that was mere data, until recently.
ItemTable_Pickups.scrap_kevlar_ItemFlavorText: The mother of all synthetic aramids.
ItemTable_Pickups.lodestone_ItemFlavorText: The origin of Lodestones is unknown, but held in the hand this artefact has a faint and unexpected inertia, as if flexing almost imperceptibly within.
ItemTable_Pickups.salem_book_04_ItemDescription: The pages of this text are nearly illegible and missing a date, but some of the sharp, aggressive scrawl can be read.
ItemTable_Pickups.sg_book_02_ItemFlavorText: The researchers 'failure' was an embarrassment, and it took little argument for GATE to convince their masters to let us 'capture' the facility, and fix it in place with an aura lock.
ItemTable_Pickups.salem_book_03_ItemDescription: The stained parchment of this tattered book is in poor condition, almost as if someone started to destroy it, but then reconsidered.
ItemTable_Pickups.tablet_wax_03_ItemFlavorText: The temple is finished, the device complete. We await the first day of Panathenaea to begin, which the Hiereia believe is most propitious. I am hopeful - a conduit to Olympians! And nervous - the Corinthian has lately expressed doubts as to the gift's provenance. Yet who else but the gods could have created such a thing? And who but Athena would bestow it?
ItemTable_Pickups.tablet_wax_01_ItemFlavorText: The temple nears completion, and the Hiereia are fretful. Their Oracle has fallen quiet. Our opponents would celebrate such silence, if they knew, but this location was given to us with an unusual clarity by the Oracle - a place of power, where we might petition the gods directly.
ItemTable_Pickups.sg_book_01_ItemFlavorText: Their control of the forces was naïve, however, and displaced not the rift, but the facility itself. For the next several years, the structure was adrift, appearing at different locations throughout this region. Confirmed sightings of the 'Kadonnut Talo' amount currently to three.
ItemTable_Pickups.neutrinomapper_ItemFlavorText: Theoretically, this is a device containing all of the neutrinos in the known universe, past, present, and future, but that would be impossible, so it's probably not that.
ItemTable_Pickups.hexwood_ItemDescription: This plausibly evil wood pulses with malice, but also conveys a sort of pliable and sturdy nature that would be perfect for construction.
ItemTable_Pickups.ITEM_MISSING_ItemDescription: This recipe's item is not set up yet. If you see this, something is missing.
ItemTable_Pickups.rotary_pump_ItemDescription: Useable in crafting a range of devices.
ItemTable_Pickups.fryingpan_ItemDescription: Used for frying up food, mostly.
ItemTable_Pickups.ducttape_ItemDescription: Used in crafting recipes and can repair items in a pinch.
ItemTable_Pickups.transformer_round_ItemDescription: Useful for crafting electrical and other equipment.
ItemTable_Pickups.scrap_cloth_ItemDescription: Various cloth bits from clothing and the like.
ItemTable_Pickups.feces_donotspawn_ItemFlavorText: We don't talk about that dimension.
ItemTable_Pickups.cpu_red_ItemFlavorText: We have identified a panoply of malformed mega-entities across myriad Anteverses. Whether these are abominations in their own realms, or simply repulsive to humanity, is a subject of much interest. Either way, with the increase in contact with lower lifeforms, as we unravel the hierarchical structures at play, undeniable similarities are emerging ... I fear we may find the answer to many of our questions before we want to. - Dr. Derek Manse
ItemTable_Pickups.scrap_gunk_ItemFlavorText: With no immediately discernible purpose, this gunk appears to be completely foreign to IS-0083.
ItemTable_Pickups.ducttape_ItemFlavorText: You know exactly what this is.
ItemTable_Pickups.coal_ItemFlavorText: You'd think this would come in handy, but it's actually quite useless compared to everything else you have available.
ItemTable_Pickups.solder_ItemDescription: Your basic solder material, created from melting silver and metal in a cooking pot.

ItemTable_Plants.Plant_Dead_ItemDescription: A dead plant. Whatever it was, it was left unattended for too long.

ItemTable_RecipeSubstitutes.BigOfficeCouches_ItemTypeDescription: Any basic medium-to-large couches. Must be packaged version.
ItemTable_RecipeSubstitutes.AnyCookedPest_ItemTypeDescription: Any cooked portion of a Pest.
ItemTable_RecipeSubstitutes.AnyStandardRawFilet_ItemTypeDescription: Any kind of standard-sized fish filet. Must be uncooked.
ItemTable_RecipeSubstitutes.AnyFilingCabinet_ItemTypeDescription: Any of the many available filing cabinets. Must be packaged version.
ItemTable_RecipeSubstitutes.AnyDesk_ItemTypeDescription: Any of the many available office desks. Must be packaged version.
ItemTable_RecipeSubstitutes.AnyOfficeCouch_ItemTypeDescription: Any office couches. Must be packaged version.
ItemTable_RecipeSubstitutes.AnyTomato_ItemTypeDescription: Any sort of Tomato, super or otherwise.
ItemTable_RecipeSubstitutes.AnyBucket_ItemTypeDescription: Any sort of bucket, regardless of material.
ItemTable_RecipeSubstitutes.AnyBarrel_ItemTypeDescription: Any sort of drum or barrel that can hold liquid.
ItemTable_RecipeSubstitutes.AnyPipe_ItemTypeDescription: Any sort of small or medium pipe.
ItemTable_RecipeSubstitutes.AnyPoop_ItemTypeDescription: Any type of excrement, regardless of... origin.
ItemTable_RecipeSubstitutes.AnyBiocleanser_ItemTypeDescription: Anything that can act as a gel or liquid while applying some sort of anti-microbial effect.

ItemTable_Weapons.smg_military_U1_ItemDescription: A 9mm SMG augmented to coat rounds in a flammable gel that ignites targets, with biometric locks removed.
ItemTable_Weapons.pistol_energy_ItemDescription: A battery-charged laser pistol that can also be recharged manually.
ItemTable_Weapons.laserkatana_ItemDescription: A blade that unleashes deadly laser energy when swung.
ItemTable_Weapons.scrapshot_U1_ItemDescription: A break-action coil gun refitted with extended magazine capacity and rapid-charge ultracapacitors for micro-detonation on impact.
ItemTable_Weapons.pistol_pipe_U1_ItemDescription: A break-action coil pistol retro-fitted with Lodestone technology for rapid charging and micro-detonating rounds.
ItemTable_Weapons.shotgun_doublebarrel_ItemDescription: A break-action double barrel shotgun of a rather old make.
ItemTable_Weapons.shotgun_doublebarrel_U1_ItemDescription: A break-action double barrel shotgun of a rather old make. ... And something more.
ItemTable_Weapons.rifle_groupe_ItemDescription: A burst-fire assault rifle designed to deliver exceptional damage to anything down range.
ItemTable_Weapons.canesword_ItemDescription: A cane containing a hidden blade
ItemTable_Weapons.net_launcher_ItemDescription: A compact cannon that launches electrified nets at high velocity and over greater distances. Stuns larger beasts than thrown nets and deals some electrical damage.
ItemTable_Weapons.biocannon_ItemDescription: A deadly biological cannon, with a very affable demeanor.
ItemTable_Weapons.crossbow_magbow_U1_ItemDescription: A fast, flat, near-silent and extremely powerful magnetic projectile launcher with dual bolt compartments.
ItemTable_Weapons.magnum_military_ItemFlavorText: A few shots from this should put down most things on Earth. However...
ItemTable_Weapons.club_fire_U1_ItemDescription: A fire-dealing warhammer enhanced with Lodestone energy transmission technology.
ItemTable_Weapons.spear_fire_U1_ItemDescription: A fire-spreading spear with the amplified lethality of Lodestone technology.
ItemTable_Weapons.spear_hardlight_ItemDescription: A firm thrusting weapon, fueled by plasma and light, with a projectile-hurling mechanism for those capable of throwing weaponry.
ItemTable_Weapons.keresphere_ItemDescription: A grenade that causes those within its yield to flee in terror.
ItemTable_Weapons.clustergrenade_ItemDescription: A grenade that contains many individual incendiaries.
ItemTable_Weapons.handdrill_ItemDescription: A hand-made power tool for construction. Can be used to package like a screwdriver.
ItemTable_Weapons.powerdrill_ItemDescription: A hand-made power tool for construction. Can be used to package like a screwdriver.
ItemTable_Weapons.screwdriver_ItemDescription: A handy tool for building furniture and a few other things. Required for construction and packaging of certain objects.
ItemTable_Weapons.cafeteriatray_ItemDescription: A hard, durable plastic food tray. Could be used to create some defensive items.
ItemTable_Weapons.spear_harpoon_ItemDescription: A hardy maritime spear capable of dragging targets towards you.
ItemTable_Weapons.shiv_ItemDescription: A hastily-made blade for stabbing things. Don't expect it to last.
ItemTable_Weapons.heatershield_U1_ItemDescription: A heat-emitting shield that leverages lodestone technology to defend and deal otherworldly damage to enemies.
ItemTable_Weapons.smg_military_U2_ItemDescription: A heavily retooled SMG that ionizes projectiles for greater damage against bodyshields, with biometric locks removed.
ItemTable_Weapons.shotgun_military_U2_ItemDescription: A heavy shotgun, cryogenically refitted to fire ricocheting rounds that freeze enemies.
ItemTable_Weapons.riotshield_ItemDescription: A heavy-duty shield originally designed for crowd-control.
ItemTable_Weapons.disc_launcher_U1_ItemDescription: A heavy-hitting carbon alloy blade launcher with a twin-tier accelator.
ItemTable_Weapons.magnum_military_U1_ItemDescription: A heavy-hitting magnum revolver lubricated with the black oil of night.
ItemTable_Weapons.woodaxe_ItemDescription: A hefty axe for felling the strongest trees. Or foes.
ItemTable_Weapons.heavy_laser_ItemDescription: A hefty laser cannon for sustained firing and an alternate mode for massive output.
ItemTable_Weapons.pistol_gk_ItemDescription: A hefty magnum that has been defaced -- or enhanced.
ItemTable_Weapons.weapon_pipe_ItemDescription: A hefty pipe with a gauge on the end for added weight.
ItemTable_Weapons.shotgun_military_U1_ItemDescription: A hefty shotgun that launches acidic, ricocheting rounds, with biometric locks removed.
ItemTable_Weapons.magnum_military_ItemDescription: A high-powered handcannon capable of neutralizing large foes and completely obliterating smaller ones.
ItemTable_Weapons.rifle_sniper_ItemDescription: A high-powered, bolt-action, military-grade sniper rifle.
ItemTable_Weapons.constructiongauntlet_ItemDescription: A high-tech construction implement capable of building, repairing, dismantling and packaging.
ItemTable_Weapons.scrapshot_ItemFlavorText: A high-tech way to fling a bunch of screws in something's face.
ItemTable_Weapons.scrapshot_flashlight_ItemFlavorText: A high-tech way to fling a bunch of screws in something's face.
ItemTable_Weapons.rifle_sniper_U2_ItemDescription: A highly experimental sniper rifle, cryogenically retrofitted for hyper-velocity ice projectiles that briefly freeze targets.
ItemTable_Weapons.teethclub_ItemDescription: A huge, heavy club armed with sharp teeth from an alien lifeform.
ItemTable_Weapons.hammer_impact_ItemDescription: A hydraulic sledgehammer with a secondary blow on weakened targets.
ItemTable_Weapons.knife_ornate_ItemDescription: A knife that is as ornate and balanced as it is sturdy and delicate.
ItemTable_Weapons.knife_groupe_ItemDescription: A knife with only one purpose.
ItemTable_Weapons.pistol_energy_U1_ItemDescription: A laser-powered sidearm that can also be recharged manually.
ItemTable_Weapons.disc_launcher_ItemDescription: A launcher that propels grinder discs at high velocity.
ItemTable_Weapons.throwing_shard_ItemDescription: A lethally sharp and strong blade of super-hardened ice.
ItemTable_Weapons.rifle_sniper_U1_ItemDescription: A magnetically extended and rechambered hyper-projectile sniper rifle.
ItemTable_Weapons.shield_hardlight_ItemDescription: A magnificent and anti-material shield of dazzling hardlight, able to deflect most types of projectiles -- if it's got charge.
ItemTable_Weapons.pickaxe_ItemDescription: A massive digging tool, albeit a touch out of date for the circumstances.
ItemTable_Weapons.weapon_flail_ItemDescription: A massive flail, made from bits and pieces of other worlds. A blunt weapon with a chance to cause bleeding.
ItemTable_Weapons.knife_ornate_dual_ItemDescription: A pair of deadly and beautiful daggers for close range engagements.
ItemTable_Weapons.throwing_crystal_ItemDescription: A pellucid blade made from the knapped crystal remains of IS-0139, fragile but expertly balanced for throwing.
ItemTable_Weapons.hardlightsaber_ItemDescription: A plasma-fueled, two-handed melee weapon that deals extra damage to shields and is able to deflect most types of projectiles.
ItemTable_Weapons.sceptre_tech_U1_ItemDescription: A powerful electrical mace with an extended capacitor bank for heavier shocks.
ItemTable_Weapons.smg_military_ItemDescription: A rapid-fire sub-machine gun of an unusual make, brought here by a paramilitary force.
ItemTable_Weapons.quillrifle_ItemDescription: A re-engineered bioweapon, turning Exor quills into deadly homing bolts that stick into targets and coat them with acidic residue.
ItemTable_Weapons.grenade_laser_ItemDescription: A re-useable and rechargeble display of dazzling lights that may cause extreme harm to anything in the path.
ItemTable_Weapons.crossbow_lode_ItemDescription: A repeating crossbow crafted from a hybrid of medieval, modern and distinctly otherworldly elements.
ItemTable_Weapons.oar_ItemDescription: A rickety old oar, somehow heavier than it looks.
ItemTable_Weapons.rifle_groupe_U1_ItemDescription: A rifle retooled to ionize projectiles that deal increased damage against bodyshields, with all pre-installed biometric locks now removed.
ItemTable_Weapons.crossbow_U1_ItemDescription: A robust, reinforced crossbow with short range scope.
ItemTable_Weapons.fishingrod_insulated_ItemDescription: A rod capable of withstanding high electrical currents, and currents of the other kind too.
ItemTable_Weapons.pitchfork_ItemDescription: A rusty old pitchfork, equally suitable for shoveling hay or rabble-rousing.
ItemTable_Weapons.crossbow_ItemDescription: A scrappy crossbow made from office supplies.
ItemTable_Weapons.plasticshield_ItemDescription: A shield made from a plastic tray, reinforced with some duct tape.
ItemTable_Weapons.techshield_ItemDescription: A shield that delivers an electric discharge when struck.
ItemTable_Weapons.shield_tech_U1_ItemDescription: A shield that projects a rapid-flux vacuum field to temporarily freeze attackers.
ItemTable_Weapons.throwing_dart_ItemDescription: A simple, throwable blade, but unlikely to survive the journey.
ItemTable_Weapons.crowbar_ItemDescription: A solid piece of steel, but not something you could just swing about with one hand.
ItemTable_Weapons.spear_makeshift_ItemDescription: A spear assembled from office and kitchen supplies.
ItemTable_Weapons.spear_quill_ItemDescription: A spear based loosely on existing Exor designs, capable of loading and firing a barrage of deadly quills.
ItemTable_Weapons.spear_exor_ItemDescription: A spear that no human hands have ever touched, present company excluded.
ItemTable_Weapons.spear_tech_ItemDescription: A spear with high electrical discharge, capable of sending bolts of lightning towards additional targets.
ItemTable_Weapons.weapon_pipe_t2_ItemDescription: A strong, sturdy pipe, but nothing you haven't seen before.
ItemTable_Weapons.club_fire_ItemDescription: A sturdy hammer capable of leaving scorching fire at the location it hits.
ItemTable_Weapons.hammer_ItemDescription: A sturdy hammer. Can be used to repair constructed objects and furniture.
ItemTable_Weapons.hammer_hex_ItemDescription: A sturdy repair hammer. Can be used to repair constructed objects and furniture.
ItemTable_Weapons.spear_fire_ItemDescription: A superheated spear capable of dealing explosive fire damage to targets.
ItemTable_Weapons.fishingrod_t1_ItemDescription: A surprisingly effective device for collecting fish.
ItemTable_Weapons.rifle_assault_ItemDescription: A thoroughly serviceable assault rifle, with an arcane edge.
ItemTable_Weapons.quantum_pick_ItemDescription: A throwable pick that returns automatically to the hand.
ItemTable_Weapons.throwing_quill_ItemDescription: A throwable, acidic quill derived from IS-0184 and its kin. Not particularly durable, but particularly deadly.
ItemTable_Weapons.nuke_ItemDescription: A very big boom in a very small package.
ItemTable_Weapons.offhand_mageglove_ItemDescription: A weighty Gatekeeper's gauntlet that allows the wielder to hurl nacreous fire from their left hand.
ItemTable_Weapons.keresphere_ItemFlavorText: Although the properties of entities and items from Anteverse 39 are still poorly understood, their effects are obvious.
ItemTable_Weapons.spear_tech_U1_ItemDescription: An advanced electrical melee weapon delivering a devastating initial charge that arcs to nearby enemies.
ItemTable_Weapons.nullgrenade_ItemDescription: An anti-hardlight grenade that will neutralize most shields, for a period of time.
ItemTable_Weapons.shotgun_military_ItemDescription: An assault shotgun, coated in black.
ItemTable_Weapons.spear_voltstaff_ItemDescription: An augmented Exor staff that condenses and discharges bioelectric energy. Charges by striking foes.
ItemTable_Weapons.sword_ItemDescription: An edged, bladed weapon intended for cutting
ItemTable_Weapons.sceptre_tech_ItemDescription: An electrically charged mace. Requires a charge to deal electrical damage and knock back enemies.
ItemTable_Weapons.baton_U1_ItemDescription: An electrified baton that briefly immobilizes enemies.
ItemTable_Weapons.pistol_pipe_ItemDescription: An electromagnetically charged projectile launcher. It's sort of like a pistol.
ItemTable_Weapons.pistol_security_U1_ItemDescription: An enhanced 9mm semi-automatic pistol with extra magazine capacity and a built-in muzzle brake to reduce recoil.
ItemTable_Weapons.sledgehammer_ItemDescription: An exceptionally heavy hammer for pounding things into the ground.
ItemTable_Weapons.pistol_security_U2_ItemDescription: An exceptionally well-engineered and balanced semi-automatic sidearm with integrated supressor, weighted for high velocity and low recoil.
ItemTable_Weapons.knife_super_ItemDescription: An exquisitely balanced and honed all-purpose knife, perfect for wasteless meat preparation.
ItemTable_Weapons.rocketlauncher_ItemDescription: An extremely capable explosive-hurtling device with a homing mechanism implemented in the scope. Rockets can be manually detonated mid-flight when guided. Depending on the ammunition used, the function of this launcher can vary.
ItemTable_Weapons.crowbar20_ItemDescription: An iconic close-quarters heavy weapon that drags enemies towards you.
ItemTable_Weapons.offhand_ornate_knife_ItemDescription: An offhand knife for quick stabs and parrying.
ItemTable_Weapons.magnum_military_U1_ItemFlavorText: An often-overlooked quality of unctions from the Night Realm is their capacity to disperse friction from this realm into numberless others.
ItemTable_Weapons.kiteshield_ItemDescription: An old shield from a bygone age.
ItemTable_Weapons.ratscanner_ItemDescription: An ornamented device built for scanning something in the environment that isn't immediately clear. Should make a decent whacking stick, though.
ItemTable_Weapons.heatershield_U2_ItemDescription: An unusual but highly effective application of plasmification technology to a defensive device.
ItemTable_Weapons.shield_hexwood_ItemFlavorText: Being cleaved from its origins has not undone whatever force corrupted this Canaanite wood.
ItemTable_Weapons.scrapshot_flashlight_ItemDescription: Break action electromagnetic scrap shotgun with a flashlight attached to it.
ItemTable_Weapons.shotgun_military_U2_ItemFlavorText: Dr. Stern doesn't often dabble in weaponry, but when he does, he always wraps it in a warm scarf of poetry. This concerns Dr. Ross.
ItemTable_Weapons.heatershield_U2_ItemFlavorText: Dr. Verenkov would be proud, probably.
ItemTable_Weapons.smg_military_U2_ItemFlavorText: Dr. Verenkov's experimental 'plasmification' technology was originally intended for rapid ignition of fuel pellets.
ItemTable_Weapons.rifle_groupe_U1_ItemFlavorText: GATE's Risk Assessment Committee isn't renowned for being restrictive, but it would have asked some serious questions about this weapon.
ItemTable_Weapons.rifle_sniper_U1_ItemFlavorText: If you can see it, you can probably kill it.
ItemTable_Weapons.quillrifle_ItemFlavorText: If you can't beat them, repurpose them.
ItemTable_Weapons.explosive_sledgehammer_ItemDescription: Incredible tech meets incredible heft, with this large sledgehammer that uses Explosive Cartridges as ammunition.
ItemTable_Weapons.baton_starter_ItemFlavorText: It's a bit worse for wear.
ItemTable_Weapons.pickaxe_carbon_ItemDescription: Lighter than a normal pickaxe, consuming less stamina when swung.
ItemTable_Weapons.screwdriver_makeshift_ItemDescription: Makeshift screwdriver for assembling furniture and other deployable structures. Can be used to package like a screwdriver.
ItemTable_Weapons.crossbow_magbow_U1_ItemFlavorText: More railgun than bow, at this point.
ItemTable_Weapons.spear_hardlight_ItemFlavorText: Not to put too fine a point on it, Dr. Jager frequently stressed these hardlight experiments were dropping well below the nanometer requirements for simple photonic classification. A more fitting name had not been selected before his untimely demise.
ItemTable_Weapons.crossbow_lode_ItemFlavorText: Nothing quite like the Lodestone Crossbow has ever existed in any of the near-infinite universes that your colleagues theorize to exist.
ItemTable_Weapons.slushiebomb_ItemDescription: Once an ice cold drink, now turned into an ice bomb of sorts. Can really put a chill on any encounter.
ItemTable_Weapons.crossbow_science_ItemFlavorText: Part bow, part railgun, just watch where you point it.
ItemTable_Weapons.heatershield_ItemDescription: Portable protection that brings the heat.
ItemTable_Weapons.baton_U1_ItemFlavorText: Safety suggestion: Hold the boring end.
ItemTable_Weapons.snowball_ItemFlavorText: Send it flying through the air with a hefty throw!
ItemTable_Weapons.sceptre_tech_U1_ItemFlavorText: Some credit for this weapon's enhanced destruction must go to Lionel Simmon's and Varsha Patel's experimental work on supercapacitors derived from IS-0121's body fluids.
ItemTable_Weapons.laserkatana_ItemFlavorText: Sometimes the only answer is: 'Why not?'
ItemTable_Weapons.vacuum_ItemDescription: Super powerful makeshift vacuum. Good for sucking up items and maybe even small critters.
ItemTable_Weapons.spear_fire_U1_ItemFlavorText: The Lodestone's ability to receive and transmit a wide spectra of energy was only recently discovered by GATE researchers.
ItemTable_Weapons.pistol_security_U2_ItemFlavorText: The Z-17's design is intimately informed by ballistic lessons learned in the GATE Kinetics Division, and honors Dr. Halen Zizek, a projectile expert and Division founder whose lucky number was 17.
ItemTable_Weapons.heatershield_U1_ItemFlavorText: The emanations from the shield's surface feels as though you are naked, as if no cloth nor armor prevents it from reaching your flesh.
ItemTable_Weapons.hardlightsaber_ItemFlavorText: The first Hardlight prototypes emerged inadvertently from Dr. Rosalia Orozco's experiments with ultra-low temperature vacuum fields.
ItemTable_Weapons.pitchfork_ItemFlavorText: The rust appears slightly damp, even after a hardy polishing.
ItemTable_Weapons.shield_hexwood_ItemDescription: The wood of this shield seems to spread and grow with a will of its own, or maybe with the will of the wielder. It is difficult to tell.
ItemTable_Weapons.woodaxe_ItemFlavorText: There's a small hint of blood residue or perhaps it's simply sap. It's become difficult to tell.
ItemTable_Weapons.pickaxe_carbon_ItemFlavorText: These facts are largely irrelevant for the creature on the receiving end.
ItemTable_Weapons.vacuum_U2_ItemDescription: This fission-augmented vortex pump cleans up, while providing extra power to catch-and-return small foes and heavy - even metaphysical - projectiles.
ItemTable_Weapons.spear_voltstaff_ItemFlavorText: Transmutes life energy into an electrical death force.
ItemTable_Weapons.shield_tech_U1_ItemFlavorText: Underpinned by the same vacuum field manipulation that brought you Hardlight technology.
ItemTable_Weapons.blackholegrenade_ItemDescription: Whatever information was available on this device, it's long gone now.
ItemTable_Weapons.offhand_mageglove_ItemFlavorText: When technology merges with knowledge retrieved from a dozen half-charted anteverses, the results resemble magic.
ItemTable_Weapons.blackholegrenade_ItemFlavorText: When you absolutely need to delete all traces of information.
ItemTable_Weapons.spear_harpoon_ItemFlavorText: While it may lack inherent efficiency, it more than makes up for it in brutal pragmatism.
ItemTable_Weapons.pistol_pipe_U1_ItemFlavorText: While not fully understood, the Lodestone's ability to store and release a broad spectrum of energy frequencies has myriad practical applications.
ItemTable_Weapons.pistol_security_flashlight_ItemDescripti: Your standard-issue firearm for facility security, with a flashlight duct taped to it.
ItemTable_Weapons.pistol_security_ItemDescription: Your standard-issue firearm for facility security.
ItemTable_Weapons.snowball_ItemDescription: Your typical ball of packed ice and snow.
ItemTable_Weapons.umbrella_ItemDescription: portable protection from rain or sun

StringTable_Errors.client_connectionfailed_desc: Connection to the server was lost.
StringTable_Errors.connection_lost_desc: Connection to the server was lost.
StringTable_Errors.error_rememberthecode: If you are reporting this error as an issue or bug, please include this error code in your report: {code}
StringTable_Errors.server_hostleft_desc: The host has shut down the server.
StringTable_Errors.client_outdatedunknown: The server or lobby you tried to join is running a different version of the game. Ensure your game and the server or lobby you'd like to join are both updated to the latest version, then try again.
StringTable_Errors.client_outdated_desc: The server you tried to join is running a newer version of the game. You may need to close your game and update in order to play on this server.
StringTable_Errors.host_outdated_desc: The server you tried to join is running an older version of the game. The server owner needs to update their game.
StringTable_Errors.host_failure_desc: There was an error while attempting to host.
StringTable_Errors.client_kicked_crossplay: This server does not allow crossplay with your platform.
StringTable_Errors.connection_failure_desc: Unable to connect to the server.
StringTable_Errors.timezoneissue_desc:
We detected that your operating system time or timezone is not set to Automatic.

Other scientists have reported receiving Einstein or Faraday error codes when trying to join a game if they have manually changed their clock time for their operation system.

We recommend setting your operating system clock time to Automatic if you are experiencing this issue as it may help avoid this issue.
StringTable_Errors.client_invalidpassword_desc: You did not enter the correct password. Passwords are case-sensitive.
StringTable_Errors.client_banned_desc: You have been banned from the server.
StringTable_Errors.client_kicked_desc: You have been kicked from the server.
StringTable_Errors.client_unknowndisconnect_desc: Your connection to the Host has ended due to an unknown reason

StringTable_Inventory.repair_instruction_1: 1) Press below on the action you want to perform.
StringTable_Inventory.repair_instruction_2: 2) Press on the item you want to modify.
StringTable_Inventory.journal_clearcorpses_notice: All corpse markers have been cleared.
StringTable_Inventory.item_tooltip_upgradeavailable: An upgrade is available for this item. Visit an Enhancement Bench to view it.
StringTable_Inventory.itemtooltip_canbebutchered: CAN BE BUTCHERED AT CHEF'S COUNTER
StringTable_Inventory.itemtooltip_canbescrapped: CAN BE SCRAPPED AT REPAIR BENCH
StringTable_Inventory.crafting_rename_hinttext: Crafting bench Name... (Leave Blank to Reset)
StringTable_Inventory.itemtooltip_repairlowdmg: Damage will be severely reduced until fixed.
StringTable_Inventory.transmog_description: Equip gear into these slots in order to change your armor's appearance. Empty slots can be interacted with in order to hide a piece of gear as well. Some slots cannot be hidden.
StringTable_Inventory.health_bar_explanation: Health regenerates by resting, sleeping, eating well, or getting healed by a syringe or other similar item.
StringTable_Inventory.journal_nogoal: I don't have a specific goal right now...
StringTable_Inventory.health_bar_explain_negative: If this reaches zero, you die.
StringTable_Inventory.inventory_weight_75_tooltip: If your inventory weight reaches 75%, you will be slowed and become more prone to leg injuries.
StringTable_Inventory.inventory_weight_90_tooltip: If your inventory weight reaches 90%, you will be severely slowed and become far more prone to leg injuries.
StringTable_Inventory.hotbar_reducedweight_tooltip: Items in your Hotbar weigh 25% less than normal.
StringTable_Inventory.research_dragingredients: MOVE THE CORRECT INGREDIENTS FROM ABOVE
StringTable_Inventory.weightclass_none: No impact on your movement speed.
StringTable_Inventory.crafting_norecipefound: No recipes found with the current filter.
StringTable_Inventory.inventory_pager_description: Reveal your location to other scientists
StringTable_Inventory.research_microscope_instructions: Rotate to change focus. Change lens to find the right focus window.
StringTable_Inventory.journal_tooltip_waypointmode_desc: Select how your main objective is displayed on your HUD
StringTable_Inventory.benchupgrade_indev: Sorry, this upgrade is currently undergoing scientific research and is not yet available.
StringTable_Inventory.health_bar_tooltip: The health bar is currently showing your Head health because it's lower than your overall health.
StringTable_Inventory.email_emailscollectedhere:
This is your E-MAIL ARCHIVE.

Things you read on any terminal will automatically be collected here.
StringTable_Inventory.itemtooltip_canbeupgraded: This item can eventually be upgraded at an Enhancement Bench.
StringTable_Inventory.scrapitem_warn_desc: This item is potentially important or otherwise unique. Are you sure you want to salvage it?
StringTable_Inventory.crafting_recipe_noshare: This recipe can not be shared
StringTable_Inventory.journal_map_missing:
This sector might have maps.
Locate a map pamphlet box.
StringTable_Inventory.transmog_toggle_description: You can also disable your current transmog at any time by pressing the icon next to a slot in your inventory.
StringTable_Inventory.crafting_donthaverecipe: You don't have this recipe yet.
StringTable_Inventory.health_continence_desc_default: You don't need to use the toilet right now.
StringTable_Inventory.crafting_currentitemamount: You have at least {0} of this item already.
StringTable_Inventory.health_noissues: You have no health issues to address.
StringTable_Inventory.health_noitems: You have no medical items in your inventory.
StringTable_Inventory.crafting_notcraftedbefore: You haven't crafted this item yet.

StringTable_Inventory.research_inventrecipe:
You need to invent this item's recipe before it can be crafted.
MOVE the items into the correct slots and let your brain do the work.
StringTable_Inventory.armor_tooltip: Your current total level of protection from equipped armor. Armor pieces only protect the limb they're covering and the weight of your armor can affect your movement speed.
StringTable_Inventory.weight_tooltip: Your inventory weight will slow your movement if it gets too high!
StringTable_Inventory.inventory_weight_tooltip: Your inventory weight will slow your movement if it gets too high.

StringTable_MenuText.menu_host_advanced_warningtext: Advanced sandbox settings are not recommended for beginners. These rules can create a very unbalanced and unintended experience. Proceed at your own risk.
StringTable_MenuText.menu_confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this world save? This cannot be undone.
StringTable_MenuText.menu_deletecharacter: Are you sure you want to delete your character data from this server? This is not reversible and you will have to rejoin the server.
StringTable_MenuText.menu_quittutorial_description: Are you sure you want to skip the Introduction? You will learn many important things, but you can also play the Introduction again at any time.
StringTable_MenuText.menu_quit_description: Are you sure you wish to abandon your colleagues?
StringTable_MenuText.menu_quit_subtext: Are you sure you wish to abandon your colleagues?
StringTable_MenuText.menu_quit_host_description:
Are you sure you wish to abandon your colleagues?

You are the host of this game and anyone connected will be removed from the game as well.
StringTable_MenuText.menu_serverbrowser_modified_2_desc: BIG warning! You are joining a server using some very non-standard rules for gameplay. This could result in unbalanced gameplay or a very wild experience. This is not recommended for first-time players or players who want to experience the game as intended by the developers. Are you sure you want to join this server?

StringTable_MenuText.menu_serverbrowser_modified_3_desc: HUGE warning! You are joining a server that is operating using modified game files that have not been verified by any third party or the developers. This could cause extreme changes to the gameplay experience, cause crashes or result in your profile saves being modified. The developers can not guarantee ANYTHING about the experience you're about to have. Join at your own risk and only if you are sure you understand what you're doing.

StringTable_MenuText.menu_youtubebutton_popup: Watch our trailers and shorts on YouTube!
StringTable_MenuText.menu_serverbrowser_newscientist_desc:
We have detected that your profile is new to Abiotic Factor. Please consider carefully before joining random public servers as your first-time experience may differ wildly. We recommend new players play singleplayer or with friends for the first time, from the beginning of the game, in order to experience the story and progression as intended without spoilers or confusing unexplained mechanics.

That said, we trust you to make the right decision. That's why you work at GATE, after all.
StringTable_MenuText.menu_demonotice_fulltext:
We hope you enjoy Abiotic Factor.

To help improve it, we're collecting some anonymous gameplay data, such as what players craft and kill, and how long it takes to reach certain areas.

StringTable_MenuText.menu_unstick_warning:
You are about to perform a force respawn. This will count as a death, and your corpse will remain at this location. This will allow you to respawn at your last viable spawn point.

This is not recommended unless you're REALLY stuck! Please report stuck locations to the developers so they can be fixed.

Are you sure you want to perform a force respawn?

StringTable_Notices.container_deleteitems_note: Are you sure you want to destroy the items in this container?
StringTable_Notices.newgame_positivenegativetraits_note:
Character Traits are what make you special and set you apart from your colleagues.

You can select POSITIVE and NEGATIVE traits. If you select NEGATIVE traits, you have more points to select on POSITIVE ones.

You have a limited number of points, so choose wisely!
StringTable_Notices.autosavecorruption_note: ERROR: We have detected that the world auto-save has failed to save properly. To avoid losing more world data, please exit now to the Main Menu and load this world save again to restore from your most recent backup save. Press LEAVE GAME to exit to main menu now.
StringTable_Notices.menu_characterreset_note: IS-0017 is capable of causing individuals passing through it to selectively lose their memory. This will allow you to reset your Job, reset Skills to a lower rank, and redo all your Traits.  Your recipes, journal entries, and other Compendium data will remain intact. If you do not wish to reset your Skills, Job and Traits, exit the doorway now.
StringTable_Notices.newgame_charactersaves_note:
In Abiotic Factor, your character is saved on a per-world basis. This means your character’s Traits, Skills, Items, Equipment and progress are tied to a given server.

Visual customization is stored locally and carried between servers.

You need to select a Job and starting Traits for your character with each new world, which you’ll do now.
StringTable_Notices.itemmangager_error_noitems: No items found in nearby containers.
StringTable_Notices.itemmanager_error_allitemsfiltered: No items were displayed due to Filter settings.
StringTable_Notices.trait_characterreset_note: This is effectively a character wipe. You are about to reset your Skills to Level 3 and change your Job and Traits. Your recipes, journal entries, and other Compendium data will remain intact. Are you sure you want to reset your Skills, Job and Traits? This action cannot be undone.

StringTable_Skills.skill_tooltip_throwing: Each level increases how far you can throw objects of all kinds. XP is primarily gained by throwing weapons, grenades, throwable devices and even miscellaneous objects.
StringTable_Skills.skill_tooltip_agriculture: Each level increases how fast plants planted by you regrow once they're harvested. XP is primarily gained by planting, tending to and harvesting plants.
StringTable_Skills.skill_tooltip_construction: Each level increases how fast you construct with screwdrivers and how likely you are to keep furniture intact when packaging it. XP is primarily gained by constructing and deconstructing furniture.
StringTable_Skills.skill_tooltip_sneaking: Each level increases how long it takes enemies to detect your presence. XP is primarily gained by sneaking around dangerous, active enemies.
StringTable_Skills.skill_tooltip_firstaid: Each level increases how much extra health is regained when using medical items. XP is primarily gained by using and crafting medical items.
StringTable_Skills.skill_tooltip_fishing: Each level increases your ability to pull against a catch without breaking your fishing line as quickly. XP is primarily earned from catching fish and other junk.
StringTable_Skills.skill_tooltip_crafting: Each level increases your crafting speed and gives you access to Bench Upgrades. XP is primarily gained by crafting and repairing items.
StringTable_Skills.skill_tooltip_bluntmelee: Each level increases your damage with blunt weaponry. XP is primarily gained by bashing enemies with blunt weaponry.
StringTable_Skills.skill_tooltip_sharpmelee: Each level increases your damage with sharp weapons. XP is primarily gained by slicing enemies with sharp weaponry.
StringTable_Skills.skill_tooltip_accuracy: Each level increases your overall accuracy, reduces recoil, and ranged weapon sway. XP is primarily gained by firing ranged weaponry.
StringTable_Skills.skill_tooltip_fortitude: Each level increases your overall health points, particularly that of your head, as well as reduces the damage you take. XP is primarily gained by taking damage from enemies, unfortunately.
StringTable_Skills.skill_tooltip_reloading: Each level increases your reload speed by a decent percentage and will eventually reduce how clumsy you are at reloading in general. XP is primarily gained by reloading weapons of all kinds.
StringTable_Skills.skill_tooltip_strength: Each level increases your total carrying capacity and eventually unlocks proper access to heavy weapons. XP is primarily gained by traveling with a heavy inventory.
StringTable_Skills.skill_tooltip_sprinting: Each level increases your total stamina by a small amount. XP is primarily gained by sprinting over long distances.
StringTable_Skills.skill_tooltip_cooking: Every 5 levels increases your total competence in cooking and ranking up gives you access to new recipes. XP is primarily gained by cooking food, baking and making soups.

StringTable_Traits.PhD_NutritonalSci: A deep understanding of nutrition, physiology and biochemistry means you know how to look after yourself. There's no question: you get out what you put in. You gain extra Cooking XP when crafting cooking items. (Suggested role: Chef)
StringTable_Traits.PhD_HumanBio: For someone with two PhDs, you're surprisingly robust. You're quick and kinetically resilient, decently fit, and can take a few knocks. Your autonomic system is under control. (Suggested role: Defensive Combat)
StringTable_Traits.PhD_MechEng: It wasn't your looks or sparkling conversation that got you here, it was your impressive facility with fabrication and tooling. You gain extra Construction XP when crafting furniture and other construction objects. (Suggested role: Builder)
StringTable_Traits.PhD_Medicine: Research on live subjects has taught you everything about the human body, especially injuries, harm and ailments. Your medical abilities are considerably more advanced than your colleagues. You gain extra First Aid XP when crafting medical items. (Suggested Role: Medic)
StringTable_Traits.PhD_Iron: ULTRA HARDCORE MODE: You are as insane as you are scientific. You have no starting perk points, many perks are off-limits, you can't passively regenerate health and you can't receive shared recipes from other scientists. (Suggested role: Masochist)
StringTable_Traits.PhD_Agriculture: You chose the lab over the farm, but never lost your touch with plants. You know biosciences, genetics, and how things grow - even GATE's most exotic specimens. You gain extra Agriculture XP when crafting farming items. (Suggested role: Gardener)
StringTable_Traits.PHDDesc_Intern: You haven't quite earned your PhD yet, and judging by the state of things, you're not going to any time soon. (Suggested Role: Blank Slate)
StringTable_Traits.PhDDesc_NoPhD: You're fresh, you're green, and probably in way over your head. But what you lack in skill, you make up for in sheer ambition, speed and staying out of everyone's crosshairs. (Suggested Role: Stealth)
StringTable_Traits.PhD_DefenseSecurity: You're one of the brightest officers on the Defense Team, and could've been a scientist yourself. There's a small rift between you and your egghead colleagues, but they respect your strategy. (Suggested Role: Offensive Combat)
StringTable_Traits.PhD_TheoreticalPhys: Your knowledge may be theoretical, but you know everything about how objects move through space, and spend a lot of time planning new gadgets and inventions. You gain extra Crafting XP when inventing item recipes. (Suggested Role: Throwing / Utility)
